Title: Goldstar / Inside Sales Representative - German
Description: |Inside Sales Representative JD  - DACH| Scope|We are seeking a highly motivated sales individual, who will work in conjunction with the Inside Sales & field sales team to increase revenue from new and existing accounts, through proactive account management and providing the highest level of service to our customers. The job role also includes supporting customers with account managements tasks related to Pre-Sales. |Performing the role in line with the Goldstar Values:| |Family| - Treating our customers and our Goldstar team members like family.| |Simplicity| - Ensuring all the solutions we supply for our customers are easy with no hassle.| |Delighting our customers| – We make sure every customer enjoys working with us by exceeding their expectations and providing the highest level of customer service and a quality product.| |Work hard, play hard| - Work hard and give our all and at the same time love and enjoy what we do.| What you will do (Including but not limited to):|Build & Develop Customer Relationships| |Be the main internal contact for all assigned accounts/contacts/leads, with a primary focus on top accounts, and responsible for relationship development with those accounts/contacts/leads within your assigned region.| |Build customer relationships with existing clients by reaching out via phone calls & emails to increase the likelihood of them using Goldstar services again.|Responsible for all Pre-Sales activity (Including but not limited to)| |Prepare detailed quotations.| |Prepare visuals, story boards, pre-production samples (including speculative visuals), and provide suggestions when needed.| |Consult with clients regarding their needs and specific briefs.| |Make sure clients receive requested products and services in a timely fashion.| |Identifies opportunities to grow business with new & existing clients.|Provide Proactive Account Management| |Apply follow up strategies on all quotations and enquiries.| |Following up on orders and gaining feedback.| |Introduce Goldstar Selling tools to customers to increase the likelihood of them using Goldstar services again.| |Chase Repeat (anniversary) orders and business.| |Gain customer feedback on service and recommend improvements.| |Build and maintain detailed customer profiles in the CRM system.| |Manage and resolve client service and order issues when needed.|Product and decoration expertise| |Be a product expert in all facets of what Goldstar offers, the features, and benefits.| |Keep up with industry trends and the competitive landscape.|Teamwork, personal and business improvement| |Contribute with ideas and feedback at weekly meetings.| |Take full responsibility for Title: Technical Support Engineer, Priority Team (German Language)
Description: |Acronis is a world leader in cyber protection—empowering people with cutting-edge technology that enables them to monitor, control, and protect the data that their businesses and lives depend on. We are looking for a Technical Support Engineer with German who is ready to join us in creating a #CyberFit future!|The Technical Support Engineer with German will function as the main support technical expert in specific Company’s products or services. Be the person responsible for resolving the customers’ technical incidents using your own expertise and extensive cooperation with the Company’s Engineering departments. Craft solutions, submit bug reports, coordinate complex tasks with other teams (Engineering, QA, DCO, Product Management), communicate with the customers to their complete satisfaction.|Every member of our “A-Team” has an instrumental role and impact on the success of Acronis’ innovative and growing business, so we are looking for someone who enjoys working in dynamic, global teams and thrives in a fast-paced and rapidly changing work environment. Just like everyone at Acronis, the ideal candidate will embody all of our company values: responsive, alert, detail-oriented, makes decisions, and never gives up.|WHAT YOU'LL DO|Focus on fast and effective technical issues troubleshooting involving various software, networking and hardware environments|Perform technical analysis of customer issues and define plan for fixing them|Direct involvement with the product and engineering teams|Provide technical advices to junior staff members and review technical results, evaluations and analyses|Create Knowledge Base articles, best practice guides and other documentation|WHAT YOU BRING (EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATIONS) |One or more of the following:|Fluent English (both oral and written, Upper Intermediate as minimum);|Fluent German (both oral and written, Upper Intermediate as minimum);|Ability to describe the details on technical issues in all their complexity when needed;|2 or more years of work experience in an applicable industry and role are a plus;|Great communication skills and customer focus, ability to prioritize and switch between a variety of time-sensitive issues|Responsible and quick to decide and act;|Network troubleshooting (know how to use Wireshark, tcpdump, iperf; experience with deploying and configuring services like DHCP, DNS, L2TP/IPSEC/Open VPN, HTTP servers);|Windows Administrator;|Linux Administrator is a plus;|Virtualization experience is a plus;|Business applications (should be familiar with one or more of the following: MS Exchange, MS SQL, MySQL, Oracle DB, Citrix XenApp, NTP servers);|Passion for troubleshooting, ability to come up with efficient solutions for unordinary issues;|Good communication skills and customer focus, ability to prioritize and switch between a variety of time-sensitive issues;|Passion for troubleshooting, ability to come up with efficient solutions for unordinary issues;|Strong internal customer focus with desire to learn all aspects of the business;|High level of discipline, attention to detail, and ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment while still maintaining a high-level of accuracy;|Strong written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills;|Outstanding organizational, problem solving, and multi-tasking skills;|Team-player and positive attitude, eager to do more and help out, views challenging situations as opportunities;|Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work with minimal supervision;|Passion and commitment to succeed by working hard and never giving up;|*Please submit your resume and application in English|WHO WE ARE|Acronis is revolutionizing cyber protection by unifying backup, disaster recovery, storage, next-generation anti-malware, and protection management into one solution.  This all-in-one integration removes the complexity and risks associated with non-integrated solutions and offers easy, complete and reliable data protection for all workloads, applications, and systems across any environment—all at a low and predictable cost.|Founded in Singapore in 2003 and incorporated in Switzerland in 2008, Acronis now has more than 2,000 employees and offices in 34 locations worldwide. Its solutions are trusted by more than 5.5 million home users and 500,000 companies, and top-tier professional sports teams. Acronis products are available through over 50,000 partners and service providers in over 150 countries and 26 languages.|Our corporate culture is focused on making a positive impact on the lives of each employee and the communities in which we live. Mutual trust, respect, personal achievement, individual leadership, and a belief that we can contribute to the world everyday are the cornerstones of the Acronis Team.|Acronis is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, national origin, physical or mental disability, medical condition, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.|#LI-KP|1|

Title: Banquet supervisor
Description: |About Four Seasons:|Four Seasons is powered by our people. We are a collective of individuals who crave to become better, to push ourselves to new heights and to treat each other as we wish to be treated in return. Our team members around the world create amazing experiences for our guests, residents, and partners through a commitment to luxury with genuine heart. We know that the best way to enable our people to deliver these exceptional guest experiences is through a world-class employee experience and company culture.|At Four Seasons, we believe in recognizing a familiar face, welcoming a new one and treating everyone we meet the way we would want to be treated ourselves. Whether you work with us, stay with us, live with us or discover with us, we believe our purpose is to create impressions that will stay with you for a lifetime. It comes from our belief that life is richer when we truly connect to the people and the world around us.|About the location:|Beachfront relaxation on north Africa’s Mediterranean coast. In the heart of Tunisia’s vibrant and exotic capital city, our modern Mediterranean oasis offers a calm, laid-back beachfront escape alongside this bustling business hub. Relax at our Spa and pools, stay connected with state-of-the-art business services, or take a step back in time – more than 3,000 years of ancient civilization are at your fingertips.|About the role|Supervise and oversee the service of banquet functions as assigned by the Assistant Banquet Manager or Banquet Manager.|What you will do|Responsible for making the function space visually appealing and presenting the menu offering for the event.| Responsible for the overall sanitation and cleanliness of the work areas, banquet rooms, and storage areas.| Responsible for the proper usage and good working order of all equipment, furniture, and fixtures in the Banquet and|Catering| Section in the shift assigned.| Responsible for consistently implementing the service standards and operating procedures in the banquet and catering service.| Provide excellent customer service and ensure customer needs are met.| Provide unique and creative ideas to enhance meetings & group experience.| Should possess in-depth Knowledge of Food and Beverage preparation and presentation.|Perform any other tasks asked by Banquet manager or assistant manager|What you bring|A banquet supervisor is responsible for overseeing and coordinating all aspects of banquets and events|Overall, a banquet supervisor plays a critical role in creating memorable events and ensuring that guests have a positive experience.|  |What we offer: |•    Competitive Salary, wages, and a comprehensive benefits package|•    Excellent Training and Development opportunities|•    Complimentary Accommodation at other Four Seasons Hotels and Resort|•    Complimentary Dry Cleaning for Employee Uniforms|•    Complimentary Employee Meals|Schedule & Hours:|48H|

Title: Responsable Support Clients H/F
Description: |Responsable Support Clients H/F|Résumé du poste CDI Tunis Salaire : Non spécifié Télétravail non autorisé Compétences & expertises Contenu généré Analyse des performances il y a 13 jours |Nous recherchons |un Directeur Support Clients H/F, en CDI.|Ce que nous pouvons accomplir ensemble :|Rattaché(e) à la Direction de la Relation Client, vous animez au quotidien et avez la responsabilité d'une équipe de 40 personnes composée de deux pôles de compétences et structurée par un management intermédiaire.|En pleine transformation, nous sommes à la recherche d'un manager soucieux du bien-être de ses collaborateurs et de ses clients et qui saura accompagner son équipe dans ce changement.|Ce poste requiert de grandes qualités managériales et collaboratives et une forte culture client.|Votre quotidien : | Animer, superviser, planifier, prioriser, rationaliser et structurer l’activité au quotidien de tous les collaborateurs de votre équipe. Analyser la performance individuelle et collective afin d’atteindre les objectifs définis par la/les direction(s) des Supports des différentes BU de Septeo. Animer les échanges et escalades internes/clients qui contribuent à l’amélioration des KPIs au travers du plan d’actions défini. Impulser et diffuser la culture du Client et de l’organisation Support au sein de vos équipes. Maintenir la relation clients à un bon niveau de satisfaction en cultivant un esprit « customer-centric » au sein de l'équipe. Veiller au respect des procédures internes, gérer et superviser les processus mis en place. Analyser les récurrences des problématiques et en faire une analyse globale. Analyser vos KPI pour proposer des plans d'actions et améliorer l'efficacité du support. Faire respecter les SLA définis par la politique de l'entreprise Gérer un portefeuille de clients nécessitant un suivi particulier. Gérer les plannings et absences, participer aux recrutements, analyser les besoins en formation pour faire monter en compétences vos collaborateurs.|Profil recherché|Vous avez au minimum 5 ans d'expérience en management au sein d'un service client, une forte culture client et vous êtes soucieux du bien-être de vos collaborateurs|Si vous aimez travailler dans un environnement agile et en perpétuelle évolution alors vous serez au bon endroit ! |Si vous souhaitez être au cœur de la transformation d'un service, ce poste est pour vous !

Title: Graphic Designer- GOMYCODE Tunisia
Description:
|Graphic Designer - GOMYCODE Tunisia  |
|
| Tunisia Tunis, Central Team GOMYCODE Hackerbase Lac 3|
|Full-time|
| |Company Description - About us | |We are building the future of digital learning in the African continent. For us it is key to excel in everything that we do, and this starts with the people that we hire.|
|GoMyCode is an educational platform that trains top talents on the newest skills and connects them with digital opportunities around the world.  At GoMyCode, we provide high-end education on cutting-edge technologies with a focus on projects in an environment that leaves lasting impressions and positively impacts our student lives. | |Job Description |
|
|Create compelling visuals for marketing content across various mediums including social media, email, and presentations.|
|Design a range of assets for branding, promotions, and campaigns both digitally and in print.|
|Prepare rough drafts and present ideas for interior designs of new hackerspace locations.|
|Design and produce animated visuals with motion graphics elements for video ads, website, and social media platforms.|
|Manage assigned design projects from conception to completion.|
|Collaborate with the marketing team to gather visual references and brainstorm creative projects.|
|Ensure brand standards are met and effectively communicated in all design work.|
|Stay up-to-date with industry trends in graphic design, web design, social media, and digital entertainment.|
|Incorporate feedback and make necessary adjustments to designs.|
|Deliver final graphics and layouts that are visually appealing and on-brand.|
|
|Others could possibly be linked to the position according to the needs of the team.| |Qualifications |
|
|Proven experience as a Graphic Designer with a robust portfolio showcasing your creativity.|
|Proficiency in graphic design software (Adobe Creative Suite, etc.).|
|Strong understanding of design principles, branding, and marketing strategies.|
|Ability to create both static and animated visuals with a keen eye for detail.|
|Excellent communication and collaboration skills.|
|Up-to-date knowledge of industry trends and a passion for continuous learning.|
| |Required education and experience |
|
|A degree in design, fine arts, or a related field is preferred, but not required.|
| |Our Offer |
|
|You will join a world-class team, determined to disrupt our industry.|
|You will take part in the evolution and expansion of GOMYCODE on an international level|
|You will feel the excitement of building a start-up and making decisions impacting the whole team.|

Title: Technicien CMS (H/F)
Description: Description de l'entreprise|Acteur majeur de la sous-traitance électronique mondiale, LACROIX Electronics est une entreprise spécialiste en conception et production d’ensembles et sous-ensembles électroniques. Depuis plus de 40 ans, nous donnons vie aux projets électroniques innovants de nos clients évoluant parmi les leaders mondiaux des secteurs industriel, automobile, domotique, avionique civile & défense et santé.|Implantés en France, en Allemagne, en Pologne et en Tunisie, nous comptons aujourd’hui plus de 3 300 collaborateurs répartis entre notre bureau d’études et nos sites de production complémentaires.|LACROIX fournit des équipements connectés et sécurisés pour la gestion des infrastructures de la voirie intelligente (l’éclairage public, la gestion et la régulation du trafic, la signalisation et le V2X) à travers son |activité City|, et pour la gestion des infrastructures d’eau et d’énergie à travers son| activité Environment|.|LACROIX développe et produit également les équipements électroniques de ses clients automobiles, domotiques, aéronautiques, de l’industrie ou de la santé à travers son |activité Electronics|. Sous laquelle s’inscrit le site de Lacroix Zriba.|Description du poste|Rattaché(e) au chef d'équipe CMS vous avez pour mission de:|conduire la ligne CMS depuis la sérigraphie jusqu’à la refusion et faire les premiers diagnostics en assistance du chef d’équipe CMS|approvisionner la machine en composants.|démarrer la machine ou la redémarrer suite à un arrêt.|contrôler en sortie des machines la qualité de la sérigraphie, de la pose et du brasage des composants sur les cartes.|faire les changements de série suivant les standards définis.|participer aux premiers diagnostics et intervenir suite dérive machines sous la supervision du chef d’équipe CMS.  |participer à la réalisation de la maintenance sous la supervision de l’équipe technique.|assurer les objectifs TRS et PPM de la ligne.|assurer le respect des instructions process / maintenance|Qualifications|Vous êtes fraîchement diplômé(e) Technicien Supérieur de formation technique|Vous avez des connaissances de base sur les composants et les cartes électroniques.|Vous avez des connaissances de base sur les process de fabrication CMS|Informations complémentaires|Type de contrat CIVP|

Title: English Speaker Lead Generation Specialist
Description:
About the job English Speaker Lead Generation Specialist
|Vneuron Risk & Compliance |is a leader and a key player in| Anti-Money Laundering |(AML) and in| Combating Terrorist Financing |(CTF). We empower |100+ |worldwide financial institutions to achieve full AML compliance in| 45+ |countries in Europe, Africa, USA, and the Middle East.|
|The estimated amount of |money laundered globally in one year |is between 2 to 5% of global GDP, equivalent to| $800 billion - $2 trillion |US dollars. This huge amount of illicit funds is coming from corruption, drug dealing, child labor, organ trade, and so forth.|
|Our purpose is to fight financial crime through technology| in order to ensure global business growth, international security and help change the world for the better.| |About Software suite Reis RCS|
|Our solution |Reis RCS |has been ranked in Chartis Research Quadrant 2022 among the| best point solutions| in Trade-Based Anti-Money Laundering worldwide.|
|Most recently, we have been awarded the prestigious |Best AML Compliance Solution at the Waters Rankings 2023|, a prestigious Technology magazine based in the UK, USA, and Hong Kong.|
|Our solution| Reis RCS |ensures the automation of AML compliance processes: Real-time transaction filtering, Transaction monitoring using Machine Learning techniques, and KYC. To date, we are applying daily name screening on about |27 million profiles and more than 15,000 users are using our solutions daily.| |Our Culture & Values|
|Vneuron puts the development of its team at the heart of its priorities. We provide a |pleasant and comfortable work environment.| Our organization is |collaborative| and |flat-structured.| And, our management is| available| and |present.|
|Moreover, We have a| passionate and committed young |team who values respect and sharing spirit. You will be surrounded by highly |skilled experts| willing to guide you to evolve in all aspects of your career. We aim to spread our innovative technology worldwide, so we can take part in generating a |positive impact.|
|We believe that every person is unique and special. Thus, |we provide attentive and active listening to your ideas and propositions| as we believe that you will have an essential role in achieving our next milestone.|
|In order to strengthen our presence worldwide, we are looking for a |Lead Generation Specialist based in Tunisia.| |Missions / What you will do|
|Data Cleaning and Maintenance:|
|Regularly review and clean CRM data to ensure accuracy and completeness.|Identify and rectify any inconsistencies or errors within the database|
|    Lead Sourcing:|
|Utilize various sources to identify and gather potential leads for different sectors and regions.|Implement effective strategies to maximize lead generation efforts.|
|    Data Enrichment:|
|Enhance CRM data by gathering additional information relevant to leads, including industry trends, company news, and contact details.|
|    Qualification:|
|﻿﻿Evaluate lead quality and relevance to ensure alignment with our target audience.|﻿Implement lead scoring methods to prioritize high-potential leads.|
|    Collaboration:|Work closely with the sales and marketing teams to align lead generation efforts with overall business objectives.|Provide regular updates on lead generation metrics and performance.|
|    Required profile|
|Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills|Self-starter and creative|Excellent written English level is a must|Great interest and desire to evolve in the sales field|Sales process understanding is an asset| |Benefits|
|﻿|The opportunity to work in exciting contexts and to help generate a positive impact around the world|Career Growth opportunity|Healthcare and wellness Benefits to you and your family|An evolving and pleasant environment that challenges you to develop new skills|Appropriate conditions to help you focus on what you love doing|A winning team that has relied on Respect, Sharing, and Passion for what it does|Equal Employment Opportunities: gender, religious, culture equity|
|Next Steps|
|If you have the ambition to stimulate your career with new challenges while capitalizing on your potential and your perpetual thirst for learning, what are you waiting for?|
|Apply Now| and Contribute to our international success!|
|Follow us on LinkedIn and Please feel free to share this post with others!| |

Title: Sr. Paid Search Specialist
Description: | Sr. Paid Search Specialist|Date: Apr 10, 2024 Location: Barcelona, B, ES, 08019 |Company: Vista |Who We Are:| |● We are part of the Marketing organization at Vistaprint, belonging to the Integrated Media Team, where we are on the forefront of leveraging data and automation to maximize profit at desirable return on ad spend (ROAS) targets.|● Our team is spread across the globe and is loaded with talent, with team members in Boston, Barcelona, London, Tunis, India and Sydney. |● We function as a centralized team, with our team members embedded in regional teams (NA, ANZ and EU). Your role will be predominantly supporting the EU Market. |● Search and Shopping are a crucial component in Vistaprint’s success, and we’re uniquely positioned to give our customers what they want, when they want it, leveraging our scale to deliver incredible customer experiences. |What You Will Do:|● Be a part of the EU Regional Paid Search team – Manage campaigns across 3 of our European markets and support the rest of the team, while collaborating with colleagues in the EU team, to achieve our business goals. |● Identifying opportunities. You will be helping the team audit areas of opportunity within our accounts and executing against these opportunities to positively impact performance of the channel, in alignment with the company's marketing objectives and you will develop and execute comprehensive paid search strategies across various platforms, including Google Ads and Bing Ads. |● Lead Projects - Oversee and manage projects from inception to completion while ensuring project objectives are met and completed on time and that all deliverables are of the highest quality. |● Optimizing and testing. Apply your understanding of the competitive landscape, our customers’ needs, and current campaign performance to test new ideas for increasing profit and ROAS of our campaigns. |● Reporting on performance. Generate regular reports on your campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for improvement for your markets as well as Projects that you lead for the team. |● Data-driven decisions. You adeptly handle key performance indicators, possess strong problem-solving and analytical skills, and excel in making decisions based on data. |● Delivering an exceptional customer experience through flawless operational execution. Your attention to detail is a strength you will bring to your role. |● Growing the business. You’ll work cross-functionally to unlock insights about customer behavior for other teams, and you’ll continue to leverage this data to grow not just Paid Search but also the business as a whole. |● Stay abreast of industry trends, best practices, and algorithm updates to ensure our campaigns remain competitive and effective.|Your Qualifications:|● 3+ years' experience in managing Search and Shopping campaigns.|● Complete command and mastery of Paid Search, including understanding of automated bidding, mastery of campaign management & account health, performance reporting and storytelling using data. |● Strong and willing team player, who isn’t afraid to help others succeed in addition to achieving their own success. |● Proficiency in Excel. You’re extremely comfortable using Excel.|● Autonomy in problem solving, breaking down larger problems and tasks into smaller increments of work to make progress more quickly. |● Is comfortable multi-tasking. You enjoy and can handle multiple projects at once. You deliver on timelines, set expectations with key stakeholders in your projects, and are comfortable tackling complex business tasks. |● Strong project management skills including ability to deliver requirements, write user-stories, manage stakeholder expectations, calculate and communicate impact Cost-of-Delay, and communicate clearly with stakeholders.|Useful Platform Experience:|● Google Ads, Looker, Products Up, Google Merchant Center, Google Tag Manager, Segment, Google Analytics.|Why You’ll Love Working Here:|We have a working culture where innovation is at the heart of everything that we do. You will be working in a truly global environment with an exceptionally talented and ambitious group in all areas of e-commerce. You will have a lot of fun working with people who are as energetic, smart, and driven as you are. We offer a competitive salary and benefits program. |Vistaprint is a Cimpress company passionate about empowering people to make an impression through individually meaningful, personalized physical products. We are a team of over 10,000 members in 24 countries working together to empower 17 million customers to make an impression. We are passionate, self-starting and audacious. We thrive in an entrepreneurial environment. Whatever geography we’re in, we bring exceptional talent together. We never stop learning and we believe you shouldn't either.|Equal Opportunity Employer (all Locations):|Vistaprint, a Cimpress company, is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, sex, national or ethnic origin, nationality, age, religion, citizenship, disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender presentation, legal or preferred name, marital status, pregnancy, family structure, veteran status or any other basis protected by human rights laws or regulations. Title: Acheteur Commodité Métal (H/F)
Description: |Acheteur Commodité Métal (H/F)| Temps complet|Description de l'entreprise|Partenaire de confiance pour l'automatisation des ouvertures et des fermetures de la maison et du bâtiment, SOMFY s’engage pour inspirer de nouvelles façons de vivre pour tous.|Groupe français, familial et indépendant, en croissance continue depuis notre création, nous sommes leader mondial de l’automatisation de la maison depuis 50 ans et pionnier de la domotique. L’innovation guide notre quotidien et garantit l’excellence de nos solutions.|Nous sommes présents dans 59 pays, et comptons 8 sites de production et 17 centres de R&D.|Profondément attachés au bien-être de nos 7000 collaborateurs, nous nous engageons pour leur employabilité durable par la mobilité interne et le développement de leurs compétences. Nous encourageons la diversité et l’inclusion en nous appuyant sur notre culture d’entreprise forte.|Basée à Hammam Zriba - Zaghouan en Tunisie, la société SOMFY Zriba bénéficie de tous les avantages d’appartenance à un groupe solide et prospère.|SOMFY Zriba (1100 collaborateurs) industrialise et fabrique des moteurs et systèmes de commande pour les volets roulants, stores, portes de garage, et fermetures commerciales et industrielles.|Description du poste|MISSION| Animer la mise en œuvre de la stratégie Panel Fournisseurs sur votre segment composants métalliques, dans une vision mondiale / Groupe. Être responsable de l’atteinte des objectifs de Performance QCD (Qualité, Coûts, Délais) des sur l’ensemble des Pays du Groupe. Contribuer à la définition et l’évolution des stratégies panel et techniques permettant à l’Entreprise de disposer d’avantages concurrentiels majeurs. Négocier les plans de réduction de coûts annuels des Fournisseurs Groupe, en s’assurant que l’ensemble des leviers de performance Achats sont bien déployés dans tous les Pays. Supporter l’ensemble des plans d’amélioration continue des Fournisseurs Groupe en liaison avec les différents Business Partners (Business Lines, Usines,...). Mettre en œuvre toutes les actions permettant de sécuriser les approvisionnements des usines du Groupe. En particulier, s’assure de la mise en œuvre des capacités Fournisseurs nécessaires, en liaison avec les « Plateaux Capacitaires ». Animer le processus des Revues de performances QCD avec les Fournisseurs majeurs. Contribuer à la définition et l’évolution des stratégies panel tenant compte des besoins du groupe (technologies, footprint, make or buy...).|Qualifications|PROFIL| Niveau académique: Ingénieur (H/F) en génie mécanique, électromécanique ou équivalant. Expérience requise|:| Minimum 5 ans d’expérience dans un poste similaire dans un milieux industriel. Maîtriser les achats grande série de pièces métalliques (millions de pièces), et collaboration avec plusieurs fournisseurs internationaux. Maîtriser l’analyse des prix, les analyses capacitaires des outils/machines, les Costs breakdown down et vous êtes à l’aise pour les négociations y compris en période de crise. Maitrise parfaite de la langue française. Bonne maitrise de la langue anglaise (Professionnel) est |obligatoire|.|Informations complémentaires|La protection des données personnelles de nos candidats est un engagement du Groupe Somfy. Title: HR Development Coordinator
Description:
|Drive Your Career| |Lear Corporation est le premier fournisseur automobile de niveau 1 au service de tous les principaux constructeurs automobiles mondiaux avec nos sièges automobiles et nos produits électriques automobiles de classe mondiale. Nos produits sont développés et fabriqués par une équipe diversifiée et talentueuse de plus de 165 000 personnes. Présente dans 37 pays, Lear opère dans toutes les principales régions de fabrication automobile du monde. Pour nos équipes performantes et positionnées à l'échelle mondiale, Nous recherchons des talents dévoués avec le sens de l'action et l'enthousiasme. Si vous aimez les défis, souhaitez expérimenter des opportunités de développement sans contrainte et souhaitez une reconnaissance rapportante, alors vous êtes au bon endroit avec Lear.| |Les missions supplémentaires comprendront (mais ne se limiteront peut-être pas à) :| |
|Elaborer le plan annuel de formation en se basant sur les exigences de qualité ainsi que sur les besoins et sur les nécessites de formation exprimée par chaque département.|
|Préparer le processus et les documents nécessaires pour le démarrage de la formation.|
|Préparer le centre de formation et veiller à la disponibilité des moyens nécessaires à la formation.|
|Vérifier et mettre à jour les contenus des modules de formation en collaboration avec les formateurs production et les départements concernés.|
|S’assure de la bonne élaboration et orientation de toutes les formations dispensées : formation d’intégration et qualification du personnel.|
|Veiller à l’application et au respect des procédures de formation.|
|Organiser des formations immédiates pour donner suite aux modifications et aux changements survenus aux procédures, aux programmes et aux instructions appliquées dans la production.|
|Participer à la réalisation et a l’animation de certain module de formation.|
|Tenir à jour, classé et archiver les dossiers de formation|
|Chercher, sélectionner des profils adéquats pour les postes vacants|
|Contacter les organismes externes publics et prives de recrutement ainsi que les écoles et les instituts de formation.|
|Préparer les réquisitions et les « changes in status sur system »|
|Assurer le Onboarding, et le suivi des période d’essaie|
|Assure la mise à jour du manuel d’organisation fonctionnelle (organigrammes et description de poste).|
|Réaliser des enquêtes auprès du personnel (ex : satisfaction du personnel)|
|Veiller à la mise en place de systèmes Kaizen en collaboration avec service CI (amélioration continue) ; |
|Respecte les règles de santé, sécurité et environnement selon les sept éléments clés et ISO 14001. |
|Soutenir les activités du système de management environnemental.|
|Piloter l’activité communication en interne (Affichage, note internes, présentation) |
|Suivre et assurer la mise en place de la politique Together We Win.|
|Assurer l’organisation des événements sociaux et suivi de la motivation action plan ; |
|Suivre l’activité annuelle de l’évaluation du personnel |
|Participer dans les projets RH divers (locaux et avec le groupe) |
|Participer et accompagner les managers sur les sujets de développement des compétences, et la gestion de carrière|
|
|RESPONSABILITES EN MATIERE DU SYSTEME QUALITE ET ENVIRONNEMENT :|
|
|Collaborer activement avec toutes les fonctions pour atteindre/ maintenir les certifications suivantes :|
|IATF 16949.|
|ISO  14001. :2015|
| |Pour réussir dans ce rôle, vous devez avoir :| |
|Diplôme universitaire |
|5 ans minimum dans un poste similar|
|L'expérience en domaine de câblage automobile sera un avantage|
|Capacité à gérer les recrutements de profils très diversifiés que ce soit, ouvriers, employés ou cadres.|
|Maîtriser les techniques de l’entretien .|
|Avoir le sens du contact et celui de la communication|
|Rigoureux (se), avec une forte capacité d'intégration et un goût du travail en équipe|
|La maîtrise de l’anglais est un atout indispensable.|
| |Poste basé à :| |
|Menzel Bourguiba, Tunisie|
| |#LI-KE1| |Lear Corporation est un employeur qui maintient le principe de l'égalité des chances et s'engage à offrir un lieu de travail diversifié.| |Les candidats doivent soumettre leur curriculum vitae pour examen à l'aide de notre système de suivi des candidatures. En raison du grand nombre de candidatures reçues, seuls les candidats sélectionnés pour un entretien seront contactés. Les candidats doivent être légalement autorisés à travailler sans parrainage. Les CV non sollicités provenant de cabinets de recherche ou d'agences pour l'emploi, ou similaires, ne seront pas rémunérés et deviendront la propriété de Lear Corporation.|

Title: Senior Client Support Specialist
Description: | Senior Client Support Specialist|Date: Apr 18, 2024 Location: Tunis, TN, 1053 |Company: Vista Client Support Specialist (Omni Channel) - 99D|Job Overview|Reporting to the Client Support Team Lead, the Client Support Specialist is motivated by successfully, passionately, and proactively meeting the customer’s needs - coupled with a strong desire to go beyond the call of duty. Going beyond the call of duty includes, but is not limited to, a strong ability to think “outside the box” and always working 100% to exceed the customer’s expectations and build strong relationships with the customers of 99designs by Vista. You are a team player and foster an enjoyable and welcoming work environment.|Key Responsibilities |● Provide a passionate, professional, and dedicated client support experience through phone, email and online chat |● Making outbound calls to clients who we find need proactive support |● Swiftly respond to inbound calls within the provided SLA |● Efficiently and effectively solve complex problems with multiple team members across multiple departments |● Provide extra, in-depth support for problematic experiences and/or high paying customers |● Collect and share ideas to better the platform for all customers and services we offer |● Help clients about how to more effectively use the 99d platform in order for them to have a successful experience |● Assist with refund requests and attempt to save refunds by providing solutions to the customer's concerns |● Make recommendations to the customer about how to bring their design to life through print or digital solutions|Key Working Relationships |● Client Support |● Designer Support |● Account Management |● Learning & Development|Required Experience and Skills|Essential requirements |● Ability to thinking innovative, and develop solutions in the moment |● Experience in an omni-channel environment |● Excellent English writing and communication skills |● Ability to communicate effectively to a variety of audiences (upward and across teams) |● Strong interpersonal skills |● Ability to be flexible and adapt to change |● Ability to de-escalate customer issues |● Above all else, obsess over the customers needs|Preferred experience |● Experience with Zendesk |● Experience with 99designs |A bit about you: |● Positive Attitude |● Ability to think and problem solve independently |● Excitement to learn, grow, and adapt |● Strong ability to deal with ambiguity |● Data-driven |● Ability to break problems down |● Adaptability & Flexibility |● Customer Service Focused and Experienced |● Ability to communicate effectively to a variety of audiences |● Ability to anticipate the Customer’s needs|99designs by Vista is the world’s global creative platform that makes it easy for clients and designers to work together to create designs they love. Since 2008, our freelance community has brought more than one million creative projects to life for thousands of genius entrepreneurs, savvy small business owners, and brands with big ideas. As part of the Vista family, which includes VistaPrint and VistaCreate, 99designs helps small businesses thrive with expert design at their fingertips. We’re committed to creating a diverse and inclusive culture that welcomes, supports and celebrates individuals from all experiences and backgrounds. We know this is what enables us to build a stronger, more creative environment – both on our platform and within our own teams. This position description is intended merely as a guideline of the responsibilities involved in the position. The employee is expected to perform any other duties as reasonably required by their Manager.|Job Segment:| Customer Service

Title: Ingénieur Développement des Moyens de Test F/H
Description: Description de l'entreprise|Acteur majeur de la sous-traitance électronique mondiale, LACROIX Electronics est une entreprise spécialiste en conception et production d’ensembles et sous-ensembles électroniques. Depuis plus de 40 ans, nous donnons vie aux projets électroniques innovants de nos clients évoluant parmi les leaders mondiaux des secteurs industriel, automobile, domotique, avionique civile & défense et santé.|Implantés en France, en Allemagne, en Pologne et en Tunisie, nous comptons aujourd’hui plus de 3 300 collaborateurs répartis entre notre bureau d’études et nos sites de production complémentaires.|LACROIX fournit des équipements connectés et sécurisés pour la gestion des infrastructures de la voirie intelligente (l’éclairage public, la gestion et la régulation du trafic, la signalisation et le V2X) à travers son |activité City|, et pour la gestion des infrastructures d’eau et d’énergie à travers son| activité Environment|.|LACROIX développe et produit également les équipements électroniques de ses clients automobiles, domotiques, aéronautiques, de l’industrie ou de la santé à travers son |activité Electronics|. Sous laquelle s’inscrit le site de Lacroix Zriba.|Description du poste|Au sein de l’équipe Méthodes tests équipe développement, vous participez à la mise en place de la stratégie de tests de production dans le cadre de l’introduction de nouveaux produits et selon les objectifs QCD fixés.|A ce titre, dans le pôle développement bancs de test, vous êtes amené(e) à prendre en charge la conception et la réalisation Hardware et Logiciel de moyens de tests fonctionnels selon les spécifications techniques du produit à tester, et selon les standards de développement Lacroix Electronics.|Qualifications|De formation minimum Bac +5 de type Ingénieur électronicien ou équivalent,|Passionné(e) d’électronique et d’industrie, vous êtes naturellement à l’aise dans la compréhension de l’électronique schématique et fonctionnelle et dans la manipulation d’instruments de mesures.|Vous justifiez d’une expérience dans le développement de moyens de tests de production et maitrisez les outils associés ; saisie schématique (Kikad, cadence), programmation dédiée au pilotage, séquençage des tests à base de langage C ou spécifique au métier (Teststand, Labwindows CVI, Labview, Ateasy).|Informations complémentaires|Disponibilité du Transport de Tunis et de Nabeul vers LACROIX |

Title: Chargé développement (German Speaker)
Description:
Description de l'entreprise|Au service de la compétitivité de tous les grands secteurs industriels : automobile, aéronautique, énergie, ferroviaire, naval, pharmacie et Oil & Gas. Présent dans plus de 30 pays, fort de ses plus de 140 implantations dans le monde, le Groupe privilégie une relation de proximité avec ses clients grâce aux compétences de ses 15 000 collaborateurs. Ingénieriste de premier plan plaçant l’innovation au cœur de sa stratégie, SEGULA Technologies mène des projets d’envergure, allant des études jusqu’à l’industrialisation et la production.|Description du poste|Présentation contexte projet :|
Dans le cadre d'une activité automobile, plusieurs évolutions d'intégration de fonction et de composant sont à coordonner, à animer et à officialiser avec le constructeur automobile;|
Dans ce cadre nous recherchons  des Chargés développement|Description de la mission :|

Title: Employee Lifecycle - Offboarding Specialist (Arabic + English)
Description: |Employee Lifecycle - Offboarding Specialist (Arabic + English)|at Remote Remote - Tunisia |About Remote|Remote is solving global remote organizations’ biggest challenge: employing anyone anywhere compliantly. We make it possible for businesses big and small to employ a global team by handling global payroll, benefits, taxes, and compliance. Check out to learn more or if you’re interested in adding to the mission, scroll down to apply now.|Please take a look at to learn more about our culture and what it is like to work here. |Not only do we encourage folks from all ethnic groups, genders, sexuality, age and abilities to apply, but we prioritize a sense of .| You can check out independent reviews by other candidates on or look up the to see how others feel about working and interviewing here.|All of our positions are fully remote. You do not have to relocate to join us!|What this job can offer you|The Offboarding Specialist manages all employee exits for Remote’s external employees with a focus on legal compliance and providing delightful customer service. As part of a larger employee Lifecycle team, the Offboarding Specialist is also expected to contribute to process improvements and initiatives in line with Remote’s strategic goals and values.|What you bring| Minimum of 5 years experience as an HR Advisor or HR Business Partner, with generalist HR competencies and exposure across the employee lifecycle. Proven experience with a strong background in managing voluntary and involuntary exits (terminations) with care, sensitivity and legal compliance; and providing comprehensive HR support and guidance on employment laws and regulations, spanning various jurisdictions. Ability to interpret and apply industrial instruments, analyze complex HR issues, undertake research, provide practical solutions and effectively communicate recommendations to clients and internal stakeholders when operating in ambiguous and unfamiliar environments. Excellent communication, influencing, conflict management, and negotiation skills, with the ability to confidently lead difficult conversations to a positive outcome, often where parties have conflicting interests, maintaining professionalism and strict confidentiality. Business-level (advanced) proficiency in written and spoken English, with additional languages considered a plus. Aptitude and appetite to innovate and optimize processes, continuously identifying and implementing opportunities for automation and championing best practices. Efficiency in operations, with an awareness of the importance of thorough record-keeping and data integrity. Tech-savvy, with the ability to successfully collaborate asynchronously on various tools, and adapt to new and evolving systems. Ability to work autonomously and cohesively in an international team in a fast-paced, asynchronous, remote environment with multiple priorities. Willingness to work flexible hours as needed. Proactive and self-motivated with a strong sense of ownership and accountability.|Key Responsibilities| Manage and resolve end-to-end employee exits across multiple international jurisdictions, prioritizing a superior offboarding experience for Remote’s clients and their employees. Provide sound guidance and manage clients' requests on various HR matters, including but not limited to termination, resignation and transfer procedures, employment contracts, and redundancy processes, ensuring legal compliance and best practices. Lead and facilitate meetings with clients and external employees, including but not limited to workforce reduction consultation meetings, administrative hearings, negotiations in separations and settlements, providing guidance on terminations, and delivering termination outcomes. Influence and negotiate positive outcomes in complex terminations, balancing multiple stakeholders with competing interests. Liaise with and coordinate various internal and external stakeholders to ensure compliance in offboarding activities and audits, including but not limited to payroll, legal counsel, government bodies, and trade unions. Draft, tailor and administer all termination and supplementary documents with accuracy and attention to detail, ensuring employee records are maintained with strict adherence to privacy and confidentiality regulations. Process offboarding on Remote’s internal HRIS platform, collaborating with various internal stakeholders, such as Customer Success, Legal, Payroll, Benefits, Time and Attendance, amongst other verticals, to ensure all aspects of the employee exit are administered correctly and promptly. Be the subject-matter expert and respond to internal and external queries on all offboarding matters in conjunction with Lifecycle’s internal stakeholders. Actively identify opportunities for and contribute to process improvements, automation, product development and overall customer and employee experience through the offboarding process.|Practicals| |You'll report to:| Manager Employee Lifecycle, Offboarding |Team:| Lifecycle, Offboarding |Start date:| As soon as possible|Remote Compensation Philosophy|Remote's is to ensure fair, unbiased compensation and fair equity pay along with competitive benefits in all locations in which we operate. We do not agree to or encourage cheap-labor practices and therefore we ensure to pay above in-location rates. We hope to inspire other companies to support global talent-hiring and bring local wealth to developing countries.|At first glance our salary bands seem quite wide - here is some context. At Remote we have international operations and a globally distributed workforce. We use geo ranges to consider geographic pay differentials as part of our global compensation strategy to remain competitive in various markets while we hiring globally. |The base salary range for this full-time position is $32,800 USD to $73,800 USD. Our salary ranges are determined by role, level and location, and our job titles may span more than one career level. The actual base pay for the successful candidate in this role is dependent upon many factors such as location, transferable or job-related skills, work experience, relevant training, business needs, and market demands. The base salary range may be subject to change.|Application process|- Interview with recruiter|- Interview with Manager|- Interview with Colleague (Language Assessment)|- Written Assessment|- Interview with Director|#LI-DNP|Benefits|Our full benefits & perks are explained in our handbook at . As a global company, each country works differently, but some benefits/perks are for all Remoters: | work from anywhere unlimited personal time off (minimum 4 weeks) quarterly company-wide day off for self care flexible working hours (we are ) 16 weeks paid parental leave mental health support services stock options learning budget home office budget & IT equipment budget for local in-person social events or co-working spaces|How you’ll plan your day (and life)|We work async at Remote which means you can plan your schedule around your life (and not around meetings). Read more at .|You will be empowered to take ownership and be proactive. When in doubt you will default to action instead of waiting. Your |life-work balance| is important and you will be encouraged to put yourself and your family first, and fit work around your needs.|If that sounds like something you want, apply now!|How to apply|- Please fill out the form below and upload your CV with a PDF format.|- |We kindly ask you to submit your application and CV in English, as this is the standardised language we use here at Remote.|- If you don’t have an up to date CV but you are still interested in talking to us, please feel free to add a copy of your LinkedIn profile instead.|We will ask you to v

Title: Systems Administrator II

Our industry-leading offering includes an extensive selection of technology and services.  From record keeping technology and plan administration and compliance solutions, to financial wellness that supports all aspects of retirement services business and positions our clients for future growth.  We are looking for a talented resource, who is comfortable working multiple appropriately prioritized issues and/or projects at a time.   One who desires to be a part of this global dynamic retirement technology team where they will grow personally, technically and professionally.|What you will doing: |The Production Application Engineer is a critical team member, assisting with the implementation and support of FIS Omni Windows and Web applications for multiple clients. improvements|Diagnosing and troubleshooting application technical issues issues|Providing detailed feedback to developers on needed improvements on product serviceability|Promote a culture of feedback to developers on needed improvements on product serviceability|Client-focused, diligent, an eye for detail and a consistent approach|A positive, proactive, and professional attitude|Good IIS or Apache|Administration of Windows Server 2012 and 2016|Knowledge and experience with basic networking concepts|Knowledge and experience with Windows security configuration and hardening concepts|Other Areas of Desired Experience but not required to be considered:|Oracle Database technologies, including RAC, DataGuard, and ODA devices|Microsoft SQL Server through SQL Server 2017|Experience with Active Directory, Active Roles, F5 devices, load balancing and general authentication best|practices|Ability to automate manual tasks related to implementations, upgrades and ongoing maintenance.|Scripting Knowledge (Batch/PowerShell/VBScript/Perl)|What we offer you:|An attractive salary package and other bonuses as performance bonus, meals vouchers, transportation….|Attractive range of benefits including private medical cover, dental cover, and travel insurance.|Continuous development through our diversified training across core financial, sales and FIS solutions.|A modern, international work environment and a dedicated and motivated, supportive team.|A broad range of professional development possibilities, resources, and opportunities.|#LI-RB1| |#LI-Hybrid|Privacy Statement|FIS is committed to protecting the privacy and security of all personal information that we process in order to provide services to our clients. Title: Director of finance & Accounting
Description: |Director of finance & Accounting|JOB\_DESCRIPTION.SHARE.HTML Check out pictures from associates at this location, and some videos too!|JOB\_DESCRIPTION.SHARE.HTML |Sheraton Hotels & Resorts | Job Description|Job Number| 24076342 |Job Category| Finance & Accounting |Location| Sheraton Tunis Hotel, Avenue de la Ligue Arabe, Tunis, Tunisia, Tunisia |Schedule| Full-Time |Position Type| Management |JOB SUMMARY|Functions as the property’s strategic financial business leader. The position champions, develops and implements property-wide strategies that deliver products and services to meet or exceed the needs and expectations of the brand’s target customer and property employees. The position provides the financial expertise to enable the successful implementation of the brand service strategy and brand initiatives while maximizing the return on investment. In addition, creates and executes a business plan that is aligned with the property and brand’s business strategy and focuses on the execution of financial and accounting activities and the delivery of desirable financial results.|CANDIDATE PROFILE|Education and Experience|• 4-year bachelor's degree in Finance and Accounting or related major; 2 years experience in the finance and accounting or related professional area.|OR|• Master's degree in Finance and Accounting or related major; no work experience required.|CORE WORK ACTIVITIES|Engaging in Strategic Planning and Decision Making|• Develops means to improve profit, including estimating cost and benefit, exploring new business opportunities, etc.|• Analyzes information, forecasts sales against expenses and creates annual budget plans.|• Compiles information, analyzes and monitors actual sales against projected sales.|• Analyzes differences between actual budget wages and forecasted wages for more efficient budget planning.|• Identifies the underlying principles, reasons, or facts of information by breaking down information or data into separate parts.|• Thinks creatively and practically to develop, execute and implement new business plans|• Creates the annual operating budget for the property.|• Provides analytical support during budget reviews to identify cost saving and productivity opportunities for property managers.|• Implements a system of appropriate controls to manage business risks.|• Ensures a strong accounting and operational control environment to safeguard assets, improve operations and profitability.|• Analyzes financial data and market trends.|• Leads the development and implementation of a comprehensive annual business plan which is aligned with the company’s and brand’s strategic direction.|• Provides on going analytical support by monitoring the operating department’s actual and projected sales.|• Produces accurate forecasts that enable operations to react to changes in the business.|Leading Finance & Accounting Teams|• Utilizes interpersonal and communication skills to lead, influence, and encourage others; advocates sound financial/business decision making; demonstrates honesty/integrity; leads by example.|• Communicates the strategic goals, the focus and the owner priorities to subordinates in a clear and precise manner.|• Leverages strong functional leadership and communication skills to influence the executive team, the property's strategies and to lead own team.|• Oversees internal, external and regulatory audit processes.|• Provides excellent leadership by assigning team members and other departments managers' clear accountability backed by appropriate authority.|• Conducts annual performance appraisals with direct reports according to Standard Operating Procedures.|Anticipating and Delivering on the Needs of Key Stakeholders|• Attends meetings and communicating with the owners, understanding the priorities and strategic focus.|• Understands and meets the needs of key stakeholders (owners, corporate, guests, etc.).|• Advises the GM and executive committee on existing and evolving operating/financial issues.|• Communicates financial concepts in a clear and persuasive manner that is easy to understand and drives desired behaviors.|• Demonstrates an understanding of cash flow and owner priorities.|• Manages communication with owners in an effective manner.|• Manages property working capital and cash flow in accordance with brand SOPs and owner requirements.|• Facilitates critique meetings to review information with Title: Senior Product Manager
Description:
|About Us|
|We empower people by upskilling and reskilling them on digital skills through Tech-enabled, affordable quality trainings. We provide trainings for the future of work on the most in-demand digital skills. We go fast and break things: So far, we have trained +50,000 students in 10 countries in Middle East and Africa. | |What we're looking for| |We are on the lookout for a Product Manager who is passionate about creating meaningful educational experiences and is skilled in both the discovery and delivery aspects of product management. This role is not just about building features; it's about deeply understanding our business challenges, student needs, and market opportunities to develop solutions that significantly improve learning outcomes and operational efficiency.| |We are looking for a creative and passionate Product Marketing Associate (PMA) to support the Product team on the release and launch of new features and products. She/he will be responsible for developing marketing strategy for successful launches. A geek in the marketing world or a marketer-soul in the Tech space. |
|Responsibilities|
|
|Discovery:|
|
|Lead user research and data analysis initiatives to uncover insights into student behaviors, needs, and challenges.|
|Work closely with business teams, designers, and students to identify and prioritize real problems that need solving.|
|Validate ideas through rapid prototyping, A/B testing, and early feedback loops.|
|
|
|Delivery:|
|
|Collaborate with engineering teams to define, design, and deliver solutions that address the identified business and user needs.|
|Manage the product development lifecycle, ensuring timely releases and high-quality outcomes.|
|Monitor product adoption and usage, iterating based on user feedback and performance metrics to drive continuous improvement.|
|
|
|Foster a culture of innovation, encouraging the team to think beyond traditional features and focus on impactful solutions.|
|
|Qualifications| |
|Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Education, Technology, or a related field.|
|Minimum of 3 years’ experience in product management, preferably in the edtech, online education, or digital learning sectors.|
|Proven ability to lead both discovery and delivery efforts in product development, demonstrating strong analytical, research, and project management skills.|
|Experience working directly with engineering teams and familiarity with agile development practices.|
|Exceptional problem-solving abilities and a track record of delivering solutions that address real business challenges.|
|Excellent communication and collaboration skills, able to work effectively with teams across different functions and levels of the organization.|
|
|
|Experience with user research and usability testing methodologies.|
|

Participe aux développements de customisations de nos produits, pour s’adapter aux besoins de nos clients. Participation à l’amélioration de nos processus d’intégration et aux développements d’outils ou de script permettant d’automatiser les taches d’intégrations. Rôle de référent technique après de nos clients pour garantir le bon déploiement de nos produits.| about you|Compétences requises:|Passionné par l’innovation et le développement de logiciel embarqué, vous êtes de formation ingénieur ou universitaire avec de bonnes connaissances en télécom/informatique, et vous avez une expérience significative de 4 ans minimum au cours de laquelle vous avez géré l’intégration logiciel dans le domaine du logiciel embarqué, de préférence orienté réseau ou télécommunications.| skills|Compétences techniques exigées :|Vous avez des bonnes connaissances des domaines techniques suivants :| Linux embarqué Langages de programmation : C, script Shell, Python Connaissances réseaux : IPv4/v6 Routing, Bridging, WiFi, http, TR069, NAT, MQTT, VOIP… Connaissances des outils d’intégration : GitLab, Jenkins, Jira, Confluence… Connaissance des outils de compilation et d’investigation : Buildroot, Yocto, autotool, gcc, gdb, Valgrind … Sensibilité aux solutions Open Sources|Aptitudes relationnelles et comportementales :| Vous êtes reconnu(e) pour vos capacités à échanger avec plusieurs métiers et travailler avec des équipes multiculturelles et à distance. Vous avez de bonnes capacités d’analyse et de pédagogie. Votre bon niveau anglais, permet de travailler avec des partenaires internationaux Vous n'avez pas peur du challenge et souhaitez rejoindre un projet critique à forte valeur ajoutée Excellent communicateur, vous savez gérer, motiver une équipe de projet et optimiser les relations avec le client final. Autonome, dynamique et proactif, vous souhaitez évoluer au sein d’équipes passionnées par le développement des technologies nouvelles aux services des métiers de nos clients.| contract|Regular |Only your skills matter|Regardless of your age, gender, origin, religion, sexual orientation, neuroatypia, disability or appearance, we encourage diversity within our teams because it is a strength for the collective and a vector of innovation. Title: Production Supervisor
Description:
|Lear Corporation est le premier fournisseur automobile de niveau 1 au service de tous les principaux constructeurs automobiles mondiaux avec nos sièges automobiles et nos produits électriques automobiles de classe mondiale. Nos produits sont développés et fabriqués par une équipe diversifiée et talentueuse de plus de 165 000 personnes. Présente dans 37 pays, Lear opère dans toutes les principales régions de fabrication automobile du monde. Pour nos équipes performantes et positionnées à l'échelle mondiale, Nous recherchons des talents dévoués avec le sens de l'action et l'enthousiasme. Si vous aimez les défis, souhaitez expérimenter des opportunités de développement sans contrainte et souhaitez une reconnaissance rapportante, alors vous êtes au bon endroit avec Lear.| |Nous sommes heureux d'annoncer l'ouverture de notre toute nouvelle usine en Tunisie. En effet, dans le cadre de notre croissance, nous lançons deux nouveaux sites de productions cette année à Menzel Bourguiba (Bizerte).|
|Lear implantera son activité Seating en ouvrant un site de production de Thermal Comfort & Trim (production de coiffe automobile).|
|Plusieurs opportunités se présentent à vous pour rejoindre nos équipes. Nous sommes à la recherche de personnes dynamiques, talentueuses et motivées pour rejoindre notre équipe.|
|Si vous êtes passionné(e) par l'industrie automobile, si vous aspirez à travailler au sein d'une entreprise reconnue pour son excellence, sa culture d'innovation et son esprit d'équipe, alors nous vous invitons à faire partie de cette nouvelle aventure !| |Nous sommes actuellement à la recherche de notre futur(e) Responsable Production – section Couture ,  vous serez en charge  est de superviser et de gérer efficacement toutes les opérations de production liées à la couture au sein de l'usine.| |Les missions supplémentaires comprendront (mais ne se limiteront peut-être pas à) :| |
|Regrouper et planifier les infonnations pemettant de suivre et veiller à Ia réalisation du plan de production (Quantité, délai...).         |
|Superviser les tâches des CE et CL.         |
|Coordonner avec le département RH dans la réalisation de certaines actions.         |
|Assurer la bonne maintenabilité des équipements.             |
|Assurer le suivi des stocks, des en-cours et des écarts entre le planning et la réalisation.         |
|Veiller à maintenir le taux de scrap pré-défini par la direction.             |
|Veiller à réaliser et maintenir les indicateurs Qualité selon tes objectifs fixés: IPPM, RPPM.               |
|Contribuer au processus d'amélioration des moyens de productions, des produits et des procédés.          |
|Résoudre ou participer activement au processus de résolution des problèmes liés à la production.           |
|Participer à la phase de lancement de nouveaux produits.           |
|Faire respecter les 5S dans la section Couture.         |
|Assurer l'efficience défini par la direction.         |
|Veiller au respect des 7 Keys éléments de sécurite et d'hygiène.          |
|Suivi QRQC ligne.        |
|Suivi QRQC AREA.                |
|Suivi LPA (CE).            |
|Audit de poste.            |
|Assurer la réactivité par rapport aux actions et décisions pris lors de CRP.             |
|Assurer une bonne communication avec les subordonnés et les opérateurs (bon climat social).|
| |Pour réussir dans ce rôle, vous devez avoir :| |
|Bac +3 ou équivalent (scientifique ou technique)|
|formation en qualité souhaitable|
|3 ans minimum dans un poste similar|
|Excellentes compétences en organisation |
|Démontrant la capacité à planifier et suivre les activités de projet.|
|Expérience en industrie automobile de préférence ayant travaillé sur la livraison (fabrication de coiffe ou textile).|
|Compétences solides en communication avec une aisance à la fois à l'écrit et à l'oral en français et en anglais.|
|Esprit logique et d'analyse, méthode.|
| |Poste basé à :| |
|Menzel Bourguiba, Tunisie|
| |#LI-KE1| |Lear Corporation est un employeur qui maintient le principe de l'égalité des chances et s'engage à offrir un lieu de travail diversifié.| |Les candidats doivent soumettre leur curriculum vitae pour examen à l'aide de notre système de suivi des candidatures. En raison du grand nombre de candidatures reçues, seuls les candidats sélectionnés pour un entretien seront contactés. Les candidats doivent être légalement autorisés à travailler sans parrainage. Les CV non sollicités provenant de cabinets de recherche ou d'agences pour l'emploi, ou similaires, ne seront pas rémunérés et deviendront la propriété de Lear Corporation.|

Title: Network Planner
Description: |Vantive: A New Company Built On Our Legacy|Baxter is on a journey to separate our ~$5B Kidney Care segment into a standalone company. Vantive* will build on our nearly 70-year legacy in acute therapies and home and in-center dialysis to provide best-in-class care to the people we serve. We believe Vantive will not only build our leadership in the kidney care space, it will also offer meaningful work to those who join us.|At Vantive, you will become part of a community of people who are focused, courageous and don’t settle for the mediocre. Each of us are driven to help improve patients’ lives worldwide. Join us as we revolutionize kidney care and other vital organ support.|*Completion of the proposed separation of Kidney Care from Baxter into a standalone company (to be named Vantive) remains subject to the satisfaction of customary conditions.|Summary |We Save and sustain lives by balancing and optimizing supply planning to meet demand.|We are seeking a highly motivated individual to join the team as a Network Planner to coordinate the production of finished goods for a global, multi-site supply chain. We will work with ERP systems and planning tools (RapidResponse/JDE). You will also support the Execution teams in Material and Daily Replenishment Planning activities.|What you'll be doing !|Responsible for Production planning, Material purchasing support and inventory management of a portfolio of finished goods.|Balance plant efficiency, sales, distribution, customer service and inventory requirements|Support/Lead the OPLAN Process with key collaborators (Plant management – reporting Sales, Production and Inventory).|Formulate & Communicate short to mid-term tactical plans that balance supply & demand.|Define & approve planning parameters that drive OTIF and Inventory performance.|Accountable for achieving Inventory Targets.|Collaborate with other Planners and Managers, Demand planners, Cluster fulfilment, Commercial & Shipping teams.|Proactively handling supply chain risks (e.g. low cover and raise issues where appropriate).|Review transfer order exceptions and cancel, close out, or decrease orders where necessary.|Monitor supply chain performance, review & support planning parameters and drive continuous improvement initiatives.|Apply scenario planning & Collaboration Rapid Response functionality and tools.|Maintain product code data and statistics in various systems.|What you'll bring !|Professional in Industrial Engineering, Business Administration or related with experience in production planning, supply chain, and/ or logistics.|In-depth understanding of all aspects of end to end supply chain.|Strong analytical and ability to think systematically with shown problem solving skills.|Experience with Microsoft Office applications, Excel and PowerPoint.|Ability to work with all levels and functions within the Company, and with external business partners.|Reasonable Accommodations|Baxter is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities globally. If, because of a medical condition or disability, you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application or interview process, please click on the link here and let us know the nature of your request along with your contact information.|Recruitment Fraud Notice|Baxter has discovered incidents of employment scams, where fraudulent parties pose as Baxter employees, recruiters, or other agents, and engage with online job seekers in an attempt to steal personal and/or financial information. Title: Restaurant Manager
Description: |Restaurant Manager - Restaurant|At Four Seasons, we consider life and work to be richer when we truly connect with the people and the environment around us.|Our family members are masters at their crafts – a gardener can become an artist, a manager a conductor, a chef an inventor. We look for employees who share the Golden Rule: people who, by nature, believe in treating others, as we would have them treat us. We look for our people to characterize a shared passion for excellence and to infuse that enthusiasm into everything they do.|Four Seasons Hotel Tunis is located in the heart of Tunisia’s vibrant and exotic capital city. A modern Mediterranean oasis offering a calm, laid-back beachfront escape alongside this bustling business hub. Guests can relax at our Spa and pools, stay connected with state-of-the art business services, or take a step back in time with more than 3000 years of ancient civilization at their fingertips.|We are searching for a talented and charismatic Restaurant Manager. Creek is the hotel’s signature outlet located on the top floor of our property with spectacular views of the Mediterranean. The cuisine is overseen by Executive Chef Alessandro Fontanesi and draws inspiration from the fresh Mediterranean flavors of France, Spain and Italy. We are committed to highlighting the very best of local ingredients, with a constantly evolving seasonal menu. The local community and their warmth are a key component of our guest experience and our Restaurant Manager will imbue a passion for the destination, cuisine and the culture.|Be You:|The Restaurant Manager will demonstrate the following key characteristics:|Ability to communicate clearly and openly creating an atmosphere of mutual trust and team work.|Demonstrates superior knowledge of Restaurant administration and operations.|Proven ability to effectively lead in a variety of situations with guests and operational needs; flexible leadership style.|Master Your Craft:|The Restaurant Manager is directly responsible for overseeing the Creek outlet’s operation ensuring the highest quality of service. The Restaurant Manager will engage, motivate and develop the F&B team to achieve their goals while effectively managing labor and operating costs.|Desired Skills and Experience:|Minimum 3 - 5 years of previous Restaurant leadership experience in a luxury hotel or stand-alone Restaurant setting required.|Excellent command of both English and French language is required.|Exceptional personal presentation and interpersonal skills, good problem solving ability, engaging, and energetic|.|The ability to oversee all aspects of the outlet operation, including forecasting, scheduling, training and developing the team.|Actively drive the Marketing/PR activities and F&B promotions according to the established F&B Promotional calendar.|Recognize and maintain relationships with regular guests as well as cultivate relationships with new ones.|The ability to work closely with the Director of F&B and the Executive Chef, to design effective seasonal menus while ensuring excellent product quality at a fair price.|The ability to build an open and trustful environment where everyone's opinion is shared and valued.|The ability to coordinate personal training to guarantee a high level of service and productivity.|The ability to anticipate, in advance, all materials and supplies and assure their availability.|As a Department Leader, you will motivate and develop a team, leading by example at all times, and instill a culture of continuous learning and improvement among your staff.|You are actively involved in identifying and assessing the needs of your team and investing in their career development through effective coaching, training, and by instilling company our values.|When dealing with external and internal customers you live by the Golden Rule.|

Title: Product Business Analyst
Description:
About the job Product Business Analyst
|Vneuron Risk & Compliance est un |leader| et un acteur clé dans la lutte contre le blanchiment d'argent et le financement du terrorisme. Nous créons des solutions logicielles en utilisant des technologies de pointe et robustes. D'après les statistiques de l'UNODC (United Nation Office on Drugs and Crime), l'argent blanchi à travers le monde représente |2-5%| de notre PIB international, équivalent à $800 milliards - $2 trillion US dollars. Cette somme colossale de fonds illicites provient de la corruption, du trafic de drogue, de l'exploitation des enfants au travail, du commerce d'organes et ainsi de suite.|
|Notre principale mission est de créer de la technologie pour |la lutte contre les crimes financiers| afin de participer à la croissance mondiale et à la sécurité internationale.|
|Utilisée par plus de |15 000| utilisateurs, notre solution Reis RCS assure l'automatisation des processus de conformité AML (Anti-Money Laundering). |Reis RCS| fait partie du |top 100| des solutions regtech les plus innovantes pour l'année 2022.|
|Nos clients sont des institutions financières venant de plus que |45| pays européens, africains, du moyen orient et de l'Amérique. Nous sommes basés à Tunis et nous avons des filiales en France, au Cameroun et au Qatar.|
|Vneuron met au cœur de ses priorités l'épanouissement de ses collaborateurs et permet à ses équipes de travailler dans des conditions optimales. Notre équipe est animée par le goût du challenge et elle porte les valeurs du |respect|, de |l'engagement |et de |l'évolution|. Vous serez aussi entourés par des experts techniques et fonctionnels pour vous aider à évoluer dans votre parcours professionnel. |
|Afin de renforcer notre |équipe produit| et parce que notre force réside dans la compréhension des besoins et des métiers de nos clients, nous sommes à la recherche d'un |Business Analyst confirmé. | |Missions :|
|Maîtrise de la problématique métier et collect du besoin du client.|Compréhension et analyse du besoin client et du roadmap de nos produits pour la rédaction des spécifications technico-fonctionnelles.|Veille sur l'évolution du besoin du marché ainsi que sur l'apport de la concurrence.|
|Planification et animation des ateliers de cadrage de besoins.|
|Présentation et validation des spécifications détaillées avec l'équipe produit puis avec les équipes développement et qualité logicielle.|Création de maquettes statiques pour renforcer votre output|
|Coordination et suivi du développement du cahier de charge avec l'équipe développement.| |Profil Recherché :|
|Ayant un diplôme d'ingénieur avec un bon background |informatique|Une première expérience significative dans un poste similaire|Vous disposez dune |bonne qualité rédactionnelle| avec de bonnes capacités de communication écrite et verbale en français et en anglais|Un bon esprit danalyse, de synthèse et de résolution de problèmes|Vous aimez travailler sur des sujets complexes et vous faites preuve d'autonomie|Vous avez le sens du service et vous êtes orienté utilisateur|Des connaissances en Risque & Conformité AML seront un atout| |Avantages :|
|L'opportunité de travailler sur des sujets et des problématiques intéressantes dans un contexte évolutif|L'adoption dune mission et dune vision de changer le monde vers le mieux |Une équipe jeune, passionnée, à grand potentiel et qui valorise le plus l'esprit de partage|Un environnement agréable et convivial|Une évaluation équitable de votre candidature quel que soient le genre, la nationalité, la religion, l'origine et la couleur du candidat.| |Vous avez de l'audace et l'envie de réussir, n'attendez plus, venez contribuer à notre succès ! |
|Suivez-nous sur LinkedIn afin de mieux connaître notre Spark team et nos solutions.| |
|
