Title: Campaign Operations Specialist
Description: |Job Title:  |Campaign Operations Specialist| | |Location|: Tunis| | |Overview of Role:|The Campaign Operations Specialist|will be part of the Marketing Analytics & Insights Team. Our mission is to use Data & Advanced Analytics to support the Marketing teams globally. As part of the team, reporting to the Marketing Analytics Manager, you will collaborate with experienced Data Scientists and Data Analysts and make sure that Marketing Campaigns are successfully executed. Your role is to drive marketing effectiveness and efficiency through data-driven insights and optimization strategies.| | |PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:|Campaign Operation Specialist | | |You assist and directly interact with marketing team with various related projects, including but not limited to direct mail campaign selections, adhoc analyses and more.| |You optimize marketing campaigns by leveraging machine learning models to target the right customers/prospects and maximize marketing campaigns ROI.| |You work closely with our Marketing managers and proactively make recommendations on the direct mail campaign selections.| |You constantly monitor machine learning models quality provided by Data Science team and always propose ideas on how to improve those models.| |You know our marketing data.| |You collaborate with Senior Marketing analysts on process improvement for their areas of responsibility to automate tasks and ensure greater accuracy.| |You document and maintain the Campaign Operations Specialist procedures and guidelines| | | |REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE/SKILLS/ABILITIES:|Campaign Operation Specialist | | |High proficiency in Python programming. Other languages such as SQL server and Snowflake are a plus.| |Good proficiency in Excel| |Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills| |Attention to detail and a strong commitment to data accuracy and quality. | |Cross functional support (ad hoc) with Marketing agents| |Strong understanding of business needs| |Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment, managing multiple projects and priorities. | |Good proficiency in writing & speaking the English language.| |Motivated and energetic at completing tasks and learning new tasks.| |Ability to meet deadlines. | |Knowledge of the reporting systems Looker is a plus | |Direct mail or Marketing experience is a plus.| |Familiarity with cloud computing platforms like |AWS| (optional)| | | |About Pens.com |is an industry leading global promotional products company, servicing over one million customers in more than twenty countries in North America, Europe, and Asia. We market, manufacture, personalize, and sell products globally through both online and offline channels. This is a remote position; however, our headquarters are in San Diego, California, with facilities in Tennessee, Mexico, |Czech Republic, |Ireland, Tunisia, Jamaica, China, and France supporting more than two thousand employees. National Pen’s unique niche is the ability to personalize a promotional product to a customer’s specific needs with low minimum order requirements. National Pen is owned by Cimpress plc, a multi-billion dollar publicly traded global entity with portfolio companies specializing in mass customization. (Nasdaq: CMPR)|#LI-Onsite   #LI-NN1| | |

Title: Social Media specialist
Description:
About the job Social Media specialist
|We are seeking a talented and creative individual to join our team as a Social Media Content Creator. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing engaging content for various social media platforms to promote our brand and increase audience engagement. Work from home opportunity|
Responsibilities:
|
|Create and curate relevant and high-quality content for social media platforms, including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.|
|Collaborate with the CEO to develop content strategies that align with the company's goals and objectives.|
|Plan and schedule social media posts in advance to maintain a consistent online presence.|
|Monitor social media channels for trends and engagement opportunities to optimize content performance.|
|Engage with followers and respond to comments and messages in a timely and professional manner.|
|Analyze and report on the performance of social media content using analytics tools to make data-driven decisions.|
|
Qualifications:
|
|Proven experience as a Social Media Content Creator or similar role.|Fluent in French and English|
|Strong writing and editing skills with a good eye for visual content.|
|Proficiency in using social media management tools and analytics platforms.|
|Knowledge of social media best practices and trends.|
|Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.|
|Ability to work well in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines.|
|
Education:
|
|Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or related field preferred.|
|
|If you are passionate about creating compelling content for social media and have a keen understanding of digital marketing strategies, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help us grow our online presence! Work from home opportunity|
|
|

Analyser les demandes de travaux (pièce, environnement mécanique, contraints techniques véhicules...), relever les enjeux potentiels (problèmes, incohérences, difficultés majeures...).|Avoir une excellente connaissance sur l’injection plastique|Faire de la conception 3D avec Catia v5 ou Siemens NX et avoir une excellente maîtrise des ateliers Part Design, Générative Shape Design, en prenant en compte :|Les surfaces de style (pièce de Design et pièce fonctionnelle).|La variation des pièces injectées dans leur environnement mécanique (définition des points fixes ou systèmes de référence).|La mise en épaisseur et l’intégration technique de la pièce dans son environnement mécanique.|Les coutures des surfaces, la mise à jour surfacique des pièces, des bords techniques afin d’éviter les retassures.|Les règles de démoulabilité des pièces : intégration des mouvements de cales dans le moule notamment pour les pièces complexes (atout).|Les techniques de mise en position, de maintien et d’assemblage des pièces plastiques.|Les techniques de jonction et d’accostage (soyage, bord à bord, tuilage…).|L’analyse de proximité et de clash potentiel entre les pièces.|Connaissance et Maitrise de l’outil PLM (est un plus).|Développement de la pièce et/ou du systèmes jusqu’à la production des dessins 2D (Catia v5 Drawing) avec leur cotation fonctionnelle pour les requis internes et les dessins fournisseurs.|Collaborer avec les fournisseurs de pièces de plastique injecté pour le développement des moules.|Qualifications|COMPÉTENCES REQUISES|Excellente maîtrise des outils CAD 3D Catia v5 ou Siemens NX (Part Design,|Generative Shape Design (GSD)…) et mise en plan 2D (Drawing) avec cotation fonctionnelle (GD&T).|Connaissances de l'outillage de l'injection plastique (type des mécanismes de démoulages : lifter (cale montante), slider (coulisseau) ; Plan de joint ou de fermeture Contact acier/acier, etc...).|Connaissances des différents types de texture (de grain) et les angles de dépouille adéquats pour chaque nuance.|Passion pour la mécanique, le domaine automobile, les sports mécaniques et toute discipline technique qui participera à son enrichissement personnel.|Joueur d’équipe curieux passionné par son travail, et engagé à relever les défis, qui aime partager ses connaissances.|Esprit entreprenant, dynamique, positif, animé par les valeurs humaine |Niveau : BAC+5|Diplôme :|Ingénieur mécanique |Expérience| : Aucune expérience requise|Langues| : Français/anglais B2|Compétences logicielles |: CATIA V5 / Siemens NX|Informations complémentaires|#TN|#LI-LSTFT|#SegulaRecrute|

Title: Account Manager
Description:
About the job Account Manager
|The estimated amount of |money laundered globally| in one year is between |2 to 5% of global GDP|, equivalent to $800 billion - $2 trillion US dollars. This huge amount of illicit funds comes from corruption, drug dealing, child labor, organ trade, and so forth.|
|Using proven top-notch technologies, |Vneuron Risk & Compliance creates world-class software| helping financial institutions reach full AML (Anti-Money Laundering) Compliance and Combat Terrorist Financing (CTF).|
|Our purpose is to| fight financial crimes through technology| in order to ensure global business growth, and international security in order to help change the world for the better.|
|We are trusted by |100+ financial institutions |worldwide from |45+| countries in Europe, Africa, USA, and the Middle East. We have offices in France, Cameroon, Kenya and Qatar. | |About Software suite Reis RCS|
|Experts in the field of Compliance, have listed us in Deloitte Regtech Universe and our solution |Reis RCS| has been recognized as one of the |Top 100 innovative regtech solutions| for the year 2022.|﻿|Reis RCS| has been ranked in |Chartis Research| Quadrant 2022 among the| best |point solutions| in Trade-Based Anti-Money Laundering worldwide.|
|Most recently, we have been awarded the prestigious |Best AML Compliance Solution at the Waters Rankings 2023|, a prestigious Technology magazine based in the UK, USA, and Hong Kong.|
|Our solution |Reis RCS| ensures the automation of AML compliance processes: Real-time transaction filtering, Transaction monitoring using Machine Learning techniques, and KYC. To date, we are applying daily name screening on about |27 million profiles and more than 15,000 users are using our solutions daily.| |Our Culture & Values|
|Vneuron puts the development of its team at the heart of its priorities. We provide a |pleasant and comfortable work environment.| Our organizational structure is |flat| and |collaborative,| and our management is |available |and |present.|
|We invite you to be part of a passionate and committed |young| team who values respect and sharing spirit. You will be surrounded by highly |skilled technical and functional experts| willing to guide you to evolve in all aspects of your career.|
|We believe that every person is unique and special. Thus, we provide |attentive and active listening to your ideas| and propositions as we believe that you will have an essential role in achieving our next milestone and shaping the future of Vneurons value proposition.| |What you will be doing|
|Prospect territories and Qualify Business opportunities|Participate in Business Development Strategies|Ensure Customer Nurturing by developing good relationships with potential interlocutors|Participate in well responding to proposals with the collaboration of the presales team|Analyze prospects' and customers need |Represent our Company and products|Ensure the coordination and supervision of the whole sale process|Ensure financial negotiations and contracts conclusion|Prepare regular reporting | |What about you?|
|"You just can't beat the person who never gives up." -Babe Ruth|
|Excellent Handling of negotiation and selling techniques|Excellent English and French communication skills|Excellent Social and interpersonal skills|Dynamic, highly reactive, self-starter, and curious|Sharp, clear, and structured communicator|Engineering degree (IT, telecom, general) or a master's degree in a business school with an IT specialization|Minimum of 5 years experience as an Account Manager in an IT context ideally.| |What do we offer?|
|The opportunity to work in exciting contexts and to help generate a positive impact around the world.|Career Growth opportunity|Healthcare and wellness Benefits to you and your family|An evolving and pleasant environment that challenges you to develop new skills|Appropriate conditions to help you focus on what you love doing|A winning team that has relied on Respect, Sharing, and Passion for what it does|Equal Employment Opportunities no matter your gender, religious, culture, etc| |Your Next Steps|
|If you have the ambition to stimulate your career with new challenges while capitalizing on your potential and your perpetual thirst for learning, this job is for you.|
|Apply Now| and become the next Spark!|
|Follow us on LinkedIn to |learn more about the Spark team| and our Spark solutions.|
|We would be delighted to meet you and give you much more information!| |

Title: Expert Software Engineering

By sending your application, you agree to this procedure. LEONI ensures the compliance with data protection.

Title: Chargé développement
Description:
Description de l'entreprise|Au service de la compétitivité de tous les grands secteurs industriels : automobile, aéronautique, énergie, ferroviaire, naval, pharmacie et Oil & Gas. Présent dans +30 pays, fort de ses +140 implantations dans le monde, le Groupe privilégie une relation de proximité avec ses clients grâce aux compétences de ses 15 000 collaborateurs. Ingénieriste de premier plan plaçant l’innovation au cœur de sa stratégie, SEGULA Technologies mène des projets d’envergure, allant des études jusqu’à l’industrialisation et la production.|Description du poste|Présentation contexte projet :|
Dans le cadre d'une activité automobile, plusieurs évolutions d'intégration de fonction et de composant sont à coordonner, à animer et à officialiser avec le constructeur automobile;|
Dans ce cadre nous recherchons  des Chargés développement|Description de la mission :|
Dans le cadre de notre collaboration avec notre client constructeur automobile, ce dernier souhaite avoir du renfort sur les périmètres des composants ADAS|Les activités principales à mener sont les suivantes :|Assurer une bonne interface avec le client;|Garantir les meilleures performances QCDP des livrables pour chaque Jalons;|Garantir le développement, la validation, l’intégration et la qualification des composants dans leur périmètre;|Manager des CDCs;|Faire des officialisations.|Qualifications|Les candidats devront avoir :|Une énergie positive au travail et avoir un gout du travail en équipe prononcé;|Une force de proposition et être présents auprès des collègues en cas de besoin.|Une expérience de gestion de la relation client/fournisseur ou client/prestataire serait un plus.|Une connaissance des fonctions ADAS, ECU serait un plus|Une capacité et aptitudes à gérer des projets, être organisé.|Une bonne capacités de synthèse, de planification, d'organisation et d'initiative.|Vous êtes rigoureux et méthodique (gestion contractuelle), autonome, vous aimez travailler en équipe et vous avez la culture du résultat.|
Le poste est en environnement international, la pratique du |Français| (OBLIGATOIRE) et de |l'Anglais| (OBLIGATOIRE) écrit et parlé est nécessaire.|Informations complémentaires|#TN|

Title: Acheteur
Description:
Description de l'entreprise|Acteur mondial de référence dans le domaine des levures et de la fermentation, Lesaffre conçoit, produit et apporte des solutions innovantes pour la panification, le goût & plaisir alimentaire, le bien-être & la santé et la biotechnologie.|
|
Groupe familial, né dans le Nord de la France en 1853, aujourd’hui multi-local et pluriculturel, Lesaffre s’engage à entreprendre avec confiance pour mieux nourrir et protéger la planète.|
|
Proche de ses clients et de ses partenaires, Lesaffre emploie 10700 collaborateurs répartis dans plus de 70 filiales implantées dans une quarantaine de pays.|
|
Lesaffre réalise un chiffre d’affaires 2.2 milliards d’euros dont plus de 40% dans les pays émergents.|Description du poste|Rattaché au responsable des achats, vous aurez les missions suivantes : |•Négocier les achats avec chaque fournisseur|•Négocier avec chaque fournisseur les quantités prévisionnelles de produits aux meilleures conditions de qualité, prix et délais, en tenant compte des objectifs techniques et commerciaux|•Définir les conditions de commandes, livraisons, paiement etc. ; établir un projet de contrat d'achats en prenant toutes les garanties techniques, économiques et juridiques nécessaires|•Prospecter les marchés, s'informer sur de nouveaux fournisseurs potentiels                         |•Mettre en concurrence les fournisseurs susceptibles de répondre aux impératifs de coûts, délais et quantités, les sélectionner d'après les critères définis avec la direction de l'entreprise|•Recueillir, en production, les informations nécessaires au suivi des fournisseurs                                                 |•Suivre l'exécution des contrats, relancer si besoin les fournisseurs afin de limiter les erreurs ou retards de livraison|•Contrôler les marchandises livrées, leurs conditions de transport, et /ou la conformité des services|•Contrôler les factures, régler les litiges|•Evaluer la qualité des fournisseurs |Qualifications|Etudes|Un diplôme d'école supérieure de commerce, d'école de gestion ou équivalent|Qualités|Sens de l’organisation et de la gestion|Excellent relationnel|Réactif et très pratique|Compétences|Connaître le produit et les techniques de production pour pouvoir argumenter avec les fournisseurs|Négocier avec les fournisseurs : construire un cahier des charges, préparer un argumentaire d'achat, négocier les prix et les conditions, rédiger un contrat|Respecter la législation concernant les achats et les contrats|Expérience|Min 3 ans d'expérience dans un poste similaire|

Le poste est en environnement international, la pratique du |Français| (OBLIGATOIRE) et de |l'Anglais |(OBLIGATOIRE) écrit et parlé est nécessaire et |l'Allemand| (SOUHAITABLE)|Informations complémentaires|#TN|

Title: Business Development Officer
Description: |We are looking to hire a Business Development Officer (BDO) with 5-10 years’ experience in sales of banking and payment solutions. The BDO must have worked with all renowned banks in Algeria and will be responsible for the sales cycle from cold calls to signing contracts to recurring maintenance. BDO will perform market analysis and will develop relationships with the management and senior staff in the banking and Financial Service Industry.|Responsibilities| |Achieve and enhance sales targets established by ProgressSoft.| |Prepare and execute a sales plan for the francophone country/s market which meets ProgressSoft’s 2022-2026 Strategy and Business plan.| |Manage the whole sales cycle, coordinating with Product Owners, Project Managers and Technical Team Leaders.| |Work with related ProgressSoft team to ensure proper engagement with customers and understanding their requirements.| |Cooperate with the Bidding Team to deliver documents and proposals which detail the Business Requirement and ProgressSoft competence.| |Negotiate proposals and contracts of solutions and recurring maintenance.| |Excessive use of ProgressSoft’s CRM to build and update client profiles.| |Analyze and prepare comparison sheets between ProgressSoft and competitive products.| |Identify new markets and opportunities.| |Develop strong distribution channels with renowned global, regional and local firms.| |Requirements| |Proven track record of sales in Algeria's banking and financial sector.| |Fluency in French language.| |Ability to deal with all levels of staff within an organization.| |Strong negotiation skills with decision makers.| |Very good communication, presentation and interpersonal skills.| |Very good understanding of banking and payments systems.| |Organized, focused, ambitious and independent.| |

Title: Business Development Representative - DACH
Description: |🍪 |Privacy Notice|Accept|Business Development Representative - DACH|Tunisia Sales – EMEA Sales / Contract / Remote At Wasabi, we’re a proven collection of pioneers, visionaries and disruptive doers. We see things differently than our competitors, and we make our mark in the industry by challenging the norm and delivering the unexpected and improbable. We’re a fast-growing company taking the Cloud Storage industry by storm and recognized as one of the best places to work in Boston. Wasabi hot cloud storage is a new class and category of cloud storage, breaking all traditional barriers and boundaries of storage with a disruptive value proposition of being 1/5th the cost of AWS S3, faster than the competition, with no fees for egress or API request and delivered as a single-tier solution. Cloud storage has never been so simple, so fast and so inexpensive. It’s all part of our vision to make cloud storage the next great global utility, just like electricity. |Role Description: Business Development Representative - DACHRole Purpose:|Wasabi Technologies Inc. is looking for an enthusiastic, driven and ambitious sales Rockstar. Wasabi’s Business Development Representative is a hunter, calling on new prospects to help them securely store their important data backups and archives with Wasabi’s fast, highly secure, and inexpensive hot cloud storage. |You’ll identify prospects who are willing to consider a game-changing cloud storage alternative to AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform. You’ll also identify prospects who are ready to implement a hybrid solution that complements their existing on-premises storage technologies. You’ll receive in-depth Wasabi training to help you embrace and enjoy the Wasabi conversation with your prospects. You’ll be armed with marketing qualified leads and an arsenal of resources to attract your prospects to Wasabi. |The Wasabi Business Development Rep works to uncover and qualify the storage needs and buying timelines of prospects. Success is measured by the number of prospects who agree to Sales qualified appointments or start a Wasabi free trial. |Principals only. No recruiters. |Responsibilities:|+ Call on warm leads generated from webinars, trade shows, virtual events, partner events and also call on leads generated by your own research. |+ Successfully qualify warm leads to determine pain points, use-cases, and potential cloud storage volume needs. |+ Schedule appointments and warmly introduce qualified leads to Wasabi Enterprise, Commercial, Channel, or Inside Sales representatives in order to accelerate their pipelines. |+ Routinely capture activities and qualification details in Wasabi’s CRM (Customer Relationship Management) database. |+ Meet weekly with marketing colleagues for closed loop feedback on marketing campaign results and success metrics. |Requirements:|+ Bachelor’s degree. |+ Languages: Fluent in German and English |+ Enthusiastic about the challenge of working at a fast-paced and exciting start-up. |+ 3+ years experience as a technology BDR / SDR. |+ Self-starter who enjoys and is very comfortable with cold calling. |+ Communicates professionally verbally, and in writing. |+ Comfortable with constructive criticism. |+ Able to leverage marketing and sales tools (Hubspot, Salesforce) to automate processes. |+ Disciplined about planning and setting goals and achieving success.

Title: Technical Support Specialist with French
Description: |Acronis is a world leader in cyber protection—empowering people by providing them with cutting-edge technology that enables them to monitor, control, and protect the data that their businesses and lives depend on. We are looking for a Technical Support Specialist who is ready to join our mission in creating a #CyberFit future!|As the Technical Support Specialist, you will be responsible for working with customers to answer technical questions via email, phone and chat. You will work closely with the Expert team to answer Customers’ technical questions (act as liaison between the customer and internal Acronis resources). |Every member of our “A-Team” has an instrumental role and impact on the success of Acronis innovative and growing business, so we are looking for someone who enjoys working in dynamic, global teams and thrives in a fast-paced and rapidly changing work environment. Just like everyone at Acronis, the ideal candidate will embody all of our company values: responsive, alert, detail-oriented, makes decisions, and never gives up.|WHAT YOU'LL DO|Provide technical support, configuration and troubleshooting of software-related inquiries via email, phone and chat for clients|Provide timely & accurate status updates to customers and relevant internal stakeholders|Track customer issues using a ticketing system to ensure quick resolution and proper follow-up and documentation|Ensure that all relevant communication, documents, and files related to the case are accurately recorded in the support system|Advise/educate customers within procedural guidelines to ensure a complete solution to their technical or service questions|WHAT YOU BRING (EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATIONS) |Fluent French and English (both oral and written, Upper Intermediate as minimum)|Ability to analyze technical issues|Ability to convey technical information effectively|Excellent analytical skills|Exceptional customer service approach|Would be considered plus if you have|Prior Call Center experience in a customer/technical support setting|*Please submit your resume and application in English|WHO WE ARE|Acronis is revolutionizing cyber protection by unifying backup, disaster recovery, storage, next-generation anti-malware, and protection management into one solution. This all-in-one integration removes the complexity and risks associated with non-integrated solutions and offers easy, complete and reliable data protection for all workloads, applications, and systems across any environment—all at a low and predictable cost.|Founded in Singapore in 2003 and incorporated in Switzerland in 2008, Acronis now has more than 2,000 employees and offices in 34 locations worldwide. Its solutions are trusted by more than 5.5 million home users and 500,000 companies, and top-tier professional sports teams. Acronis products are available through over 50,000 partners and service providers in over 150 countries and 26 languages.|Acronis is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, national origin, physical or mental disability, medical condition, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.|#LI-LD1| |

Title: Senior Devops/SRE engineer
Description: |Hello. Welcome to ADP Careers.|We’re glad you’re here. You can make your visit even better when you personalize your web site experience with the choices below.|Senior Devops/SRE engineer|Req Number: 251131 |Category: Technology |Posted Date: April 24, 2024 |Work Location(s): Tunis , Tunis , TN |Détail Du Poste|Dans ce rôle, vous créerez des solutions innovantes et flexibles pour l’automatisation, l’exécution et la mise en œuvre de processus permettant de livrer nos produits plus rapidement sur le marché tout en assurant un niveau de qualité, de service et de sécurité pour les clients ayant choisis nos solutions.|Les Principales Activités| Être le garant de la disponibilité et de la performance des applications Gérer et optimiser les workflows de déploiement Travailler sur l’automatisation de l’exploitation Garantir la qualité de service de votre patrimoine applicatif. Maximiser la résilience en automatisant les opérations. Gérer les incidents et les problèmes en Identifiant les points de défaillance et des goulots d’étranglement des performances et de fournir les analyses Opérer les changements techniques (Parfois en HNO) Analyser l’ensemble de la production afin d’améliorer la productivité et d’optimiser les ressources informatiques Etablir les consignes, les modes opératoires, les documents d’exploitation Participer aux événements agiles et aux échanges quotidiens, et apporter à l’équipe votre savoir-faire. Interagir sur pleins de projets et de technologies différentes dans un cadre agile (Scrum)|Compétences Techniques| Maîtrise exceptionnelle des systèmes Linux (Suse / RedHat) Artisan qualifié dans la rédaction de scripts Shell/Python Expert dans l’utilisation des outils DEVOPS : Ansible, Ansible Tower, Gitlab, Jenkins ou Jenkins as a code, Jfrog artifactory Expert en technologies de conteneurisation, notamment Kubernetes ou Openshift Maîtrise des outils Monitoring (Splunlk, Dynatrace, Nagios) Habile dans le diagnostic des paramètres JVM Une expérience dans la technologie Cloud AWS serait un atout précieux Maitrise globale au niveau réseau Maitrise globale du langage SQL (Oracle) |Compétences Non Techniques| Vous possédez déjà une expérience (minimum 2 ans) dans le domaine Avoir un bon esprit de synthèse et d’analyse, être rigoureux et méthodiques Bonnes compétences interpersonnelles, ouverture d’esprit et expérience en gestion d’équipe et en développement des collaborateurs.|Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Equal Employment Opportunity at ADP:| ADP is committed to an inclusive, diverse and equitable workplace, and is further committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of any protected characteristic including: race, color, genetic information, creed, national origin, religion, sex, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, lawful alien status, ancestry, age, marital status, protected veteran status or disability. Title: Copywriter
Description:
|About us:|
|At Cognira, We strongly believe that |people| are the biggest asset of our company. Our hand-picked team consists of passionate, collaborative, and forward-thinking individuals from all over the globe. |
|We are passionate about making science easy and accessible to |retailers|, helping them get more value from people, data, and systems. We bring together expertise in retail, science, and scalable technologies to automate and enhance the quality of decision-making through software and consulting services.| |Our values:|
|
|Stand up for what’s right|
|Customers are always first|
|Think like an Entrepreneur. Act like a CEO.|
|Learn, Unlearn, Relearn|
|No brilliant jerks allowed|
|All work and no play is no fun at all|
| |Are you ready to grow with us? To find out more about Cognira, please visit our website at www.cognira.com| |About this role|
|Cognira is seeking a passionate and creative copywriter. This team member has excellent writing and research skills to help support the fast-growing marketing team. Our Copywriter will write and edit copies for a variety of projects (including web, mobile, video, social media, and print), work closely with the strategy and design teams to brainstorm ideas, and help set initiatives and goals.| |While this role will work right alongside the Marketing Strategist, it is important that our copywriter has the ability to drive their own projects and communicate independently with various departments at Cognira. |
|The secret sauce for success? Being a team player with a passion for creativity. | |Important: Please send your resume in English and add a link or PDF to your portfolio.| |What you will do |
|
|Create and edit original copy that is accurate, well-researched, and meets the goals of the marketing strategy. |
|Conduct high-quality research and interviews.|
|Utilize SEO principles to maximize copy’s reach. |
|Create copy that reflects Cognira’s brand identity and ensures consistency across all communication.|
|Work with the marketing team and external resources to create and brainstorm marketing collateral (media, social, digital).|
|Monitor industry trends (retail, software etc.) and ensure our copy is aligned with the relevant market research. |
|Help set goals and work to hit them with the marketing team.|
| |We would love to hear from you if |
|
|You have a BA/BS or equivalent. Concentration in Marketing, English, or Communication is preferred.  |
|You've got 2+ years of marketing or communication experience.|
|You're a creative person and have a collaborative spirit. |
|You've got excellent writing skills & strong research skills.|
|You had a previous experience working with social media advertising (Linkedin ads), Email campaigns, Google Analytics, and Google AdWords (preferred).  |
|You're looking for a full-time position. |
| |Even better if you have|
|
|SaaS B2B marketing experience.|
|Knowledge about the |Retail industry|.|
|A previous experience in a f|ast-paced start-up.|
|Experience in SEO & SEM.|
| |Here's what you'll enjoy|
|
|Competitive salaries, progressive bonuses, and benefits.|
|22 days of Paid Time Off, plus national holidays.|
|Learn and share sessions.|
|Social events and after-work.|
|A flexible, diverse work environment. |
|Casual dress code. |
|Respectful, innovative team.|
|Work/life balance.|
| |Important: Please send your resume in English and add a link or PDF to your portfolio.|

Title: Pricing Specialist
Description: |Job Title: |Pricing Specialist| | |Report to: |Pricing & Promotions Team Lead| | |Location|: Tunis, Tunisia| | |Overview of Role:|The role of the Pricing Specialist is to compile product and pricing data from a range of competitor websites across multiple countries and identify and report on trends in pricing and promotional activity to the business. In addition, the Pricing Specialist is responsible for ensuring price changes and promotional discounts are loaded accurately and on time. This role requires excellent attention to detail and a good understanding of the product range and relevant product attributes. The Pricing Specialist will work with a variety web-based programs to manage price, cost, product attributes and competitor product matches.  | | |What you will do:| | |Assemble detailed pricing analysis and product data from competitor websites | |Identify and document equivalent competitor products using product attributes   | |Monitor and report on competitor promotional activity and market trends | |Load price changes in line with pricing strategy and margin policy | |Provide ad hoc reviews of key metrics including cost, margin, and price index  | |Execute promotional activities across various channels using web applications | |Collaborate with a variety of internal stakeholders including Country Managers, Merchandising, Product Data Management and Pricing Analytics teams | |Other duties as assigned | | | |What we need from you:| The ideal candidate is a self-starter with a commitment to producing high quality work and excellent   attention to detail. The candidate should be comfortable working with web-based applications as well   as large datasets and display the ability to solve problems creatively. We are looking for a results- driven team player with a strong willingness to learn and excellent communication skills.  | | | |Experience:| | |University degree or technical certificate required | |Previous working experience in market research or competitive analysis preferred | |Skills and abilities:| | |Ability to work effectively within a team | |Diligence and excellent attention to detail required | |Intermediate level Microsoft Excel, Word, Teams, and Outlook | |Proactive and clear communicator | |Languages:  | |English intermediate proficiency required | |Other languages are a plus:  | |French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Czech, Slovene, Slovak, Hungarian | | | | | |About Pens.com|Pen.com's personalized promotional products are created for and inspired by small businesses. With 56 years of experience and serving 22 countries worldwide, Pens.com offers MORE value, savings and time to customers through expert guidance on a broad range of personalized promotional products, including writing instruments, stationery, drinkware, bags, gifts, and trade show accessories. Pens.com operates via a network of more than 10 facilities across North America, Europe, Africa, and Asia.|To learn more, visit: www.PENS.com|Pens.com is a National Pen and Cimpress brand (Nasdaq: CMPR).|#LI-Onsite #LI-NG1| | |

Title: Sales Development Representative
Description:
About the job Sales Development Representative
|Vneuron Risk & Compliance |is a leader and a key player in |Anti-Money Laundering| (AML) and in |Combatting Terrorist Financing |(CTF). We empower |100+| worldwide financial institutions to achieve full AML compliance in |45+| countries in Europe, Africa, USA, and the Middle East. We are present in Tunisia, France, Cameroon, and Qatar.|
|The estimated amount of |money laundered globally in one year| is between 2 to 5% of global GDP, equivalent to |$800 billion - $2 trillion| US dollars. This huge amount of illicit funds is coming from corruption, drug dealing, child labor, organ trade, and so forth.|
|Our purpose is to| |fight financial crime| |through technology| in order to ensure global business growth, and international security and to help change the world for the better.| |About Software suite Reis RCS|
|Our solution |Reis RCS| has been ranked in Chartis Research Quadrant 2022 among the| best |point solutions| in Trade-Based Anti-Money Laundering worldwide.|
|Most recently, we have been awarded the prestigious |Best AML Compliance Solution at the Waters Rankings 2023|, a prestigious Technology magazine based in the UK, USA, and Hong Kong.|
|Our solution |Reis RCS| ensures the automation of AML compliance processes: Real-time transaction filtering, Transaction monitoring using Machine Learning techniques, and KYC. To date, we are applying daily name screening on about |27 million profiles and more than 15,000 users are using our solutions daily.| |Our Culture & Values|
|Vneuron puts the development of its team at the heart of its priorities. We provide a |pleasant and comfortable work environment.| Our organization is |collaborative| and |flat-structured. |And, our management is |available |and |present.|
|Moreover, We have a |passionate and committed young| team who values respect and sharing spirit. You will be surrounded by highly |skilled experts| willing to guide you to evolve in all aspects of your career. We aim to spread our innovative technology worldwide, so we can take part in generating a |positive impact|.|
|We believe that every person is unique and special. Thus, |we provide attentive and active listening to your ideas and propositions |as we believe that you will have an essential role in achieving our next milestone.|
|In order to strengthen our presence worldwide, we are looking for a |Sales Development Representative based in Tunisia|.|

Title: Social Media marketing
Description:
About the job Social Media marketing
|About the job|
|Job Description:|
|1. Plan, produce and create a program of digital content to be used across all our digital channels, increasing engagement with our audiences.|
|2. Lead day to day social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Tiktok, Snapchat and other platforms needed and be up to date with the trends.|
|3. Develop creative ideas, suggest new innovative ways of delivering digital content, and keep up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends.|
|4. Create graphics, and update company profile and company communication|
|5. Monitor, analyze, and report on the performance of digital channels/activities using tools like Google Analytics, Fb, and Instagram to analyze, feedback, and use the data to inform future activities.|
|6. Priorities and schedules work effectively, anticipating problems and adjusting the allocation of resources and time accordingly.|
|9. Creates attractive content that promotes audience interaction & increases audience participation.|
|10. Creates marketing and social media campaigns and strategies, and implementation schedules & evaluates its success by providing the report.|
|11. Schedule a story post on the social media account & link to other accounts and report progress by providing audience/follower responses & reactions according to the set objectives.|
|12. Monitor SEO and user engagement and suggest content optimization.|
|13. Creates social media content, extracted from photoshoots, exhibitions & press, or live shows.|
| 14.Control, track and monitor our websites inside and outside.|
|Qualifications:|
|1. Bachelors degree in marketing or related fields.|
|2. Experience designing program. |
|3.Experience in Microsoft office.|
|4.Fluent in English and French|
|

Title: Guest Service Expert
Description: |Guest Service Expert|JOB\_DESCRIPTION.SHARE.HTML Check out pictures from associates at this location, and some videos too!|JOB\_DESCRIPTION.SHARE.HTML |Marriott Hotels Resorts | Job Description|Job Number| 24071593 |Job Category| Food and Beverage & Culinary |Location| Tunis Marriott Hotel, Centre Urbain Nord, Tunis, Tunisia, Tunisia |Schedule| Full-Time |Position Type| Non-Management |POSITION SUMMARY|Our jobs aren’t just about putting food on the table that our guests will enjoy until they ask for their bill. Instead, we want to build an experience that is memorable and unique – with food and drinks on the side. Our Guest Service Experts take the initiative and deliver a wide range of services to make sure that guests enjoy their meal. Whether setting tables, communicating with the kitchen, interacting and serving guests, or cleaning work areas and supplies, the Guest Service Expert makes transactions feel like part of the experience.|No matter what position you are in, there are a few things that are critical to success – creating a safe workplace, following company policies and procedures, upholding quality standards, and ensuring your uniform, personal appearance, and communications are professional. Guest Service Experts will be on their feet and moving around (stand, sit, or walk for an extended time; moving over sloping, uneven, or slippery surfaces), managing the menu (read and visually verify information), and taking a hands-on approach to work (move, lift, carry, push, pull, and place objects weighing less than or equal to 25 pounds without assistance and 50 pounds with assistance; reach overhead and below the knees, including bending, twisting, pulling, and stooping). Doing all these things well (and other reasonable job duties as requested) is critical for Guest Service Experts – to get it right for our guests and our business each and every time.|PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS|Education: High school diploma or G.E.D. equivalent.|Related Work Experience: Less than 1-year related work experience.|Supervisory Experience: No supervisory experience.|License or Certification: None|Marriott International is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. We are committed to non-discrimination on any protected basis, such as disability and veteran status, or any other basis covered under applicable law.|Marriott Hotels strive to elevate the art of hospitality, innovating at every opportunity while keeping the comfort of the oh-so-familiar all around the globe. As a host with Marriott Hotels, you will help keep the promise of “Wonderful Hospitality. Always.” by delivering thoughtful, heartfelt, forward-thinking service that upholds and builds upon this living legacy. With the name that’s synonymous with hospitality the world over, we are proud to welcome you to explore a career with Marriott Hotels. In joining Marriott Hotels, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International. |Be| where you can do your best work, |begin| your purpose, |belong| to an amazing global team, and |become| the best version of you. JW Marriott is part of Marriott International's luxury portfolio and consists of more than 100 beautiful properties in gateway cities and distinctive resort locations around the world. JW believes our associates come first. Because if you’re happy, our guests will be happy. JW Marriott associates are confident, innovative, genuine, intuitive, and carry on the legacy of the brand’s namesake and company founder, J.Willard Marriott. Our hotels offer a work experience unlike any other, where you’ll be part of a community and enjoy true camaraderie with a diverse group of co-workers. JW creates opportunities for training, development, recognition and most importantly, a place where you can pursue your passions in a luxury environment with a focus on holistic well-being. Treating guests exceptionally starts with the way we take care of our associates. That’s The JW Treatment™. In joining JW Marriott, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International. |Be| where you can do your best work,​ |begin| your purpose, |belong| to an amazing global​ team, and |become| the best version of you. |Check out pictures from associates at this location, and some videos too!

Description: Description de l'entreprise|Edifis Group| est une entreprise leader d'importation et de distribution d'équipements sanitaires. Nous sommes les représentants exclusifs de grandes entreprises européennes, dont notamment la marque suisse Geberit et les marques allemandes Hansgrohe et Axor en Tunisie.|Vous souhaitez donner à votre carrière de nouvelles perspectives, poursuivre des challenges permanents et intégrer une entreprise en plein développement ? Vous avez le sens commercial, de la persuasion, de la pugnacité, une capacité de négociation et d’écoute, un comportement orienté vers l'atteinte des objectifs : ce poste est fait pour vous.|Ce que nous offrons : |un environnement de travail caractérisé par des normes élevées et un enthousiasme pour ce que nous faisons. Nos employés bénéficient d'un environnement de travail positif avec beaucoup de créativité et de flexibilité. Nous promouvons leur performance avec des programmes de formation professionnelle et diverses perspectives de carrière.|Description du poste|Rattaché(e) au Département Commercial, vous serez l’ambassadeur de notre société sur votre secteur géographique. Vous serez l’intermédiaire entre le siège et le terrain sur votre périmètre, à travers la diffusion de la stratégie et de la politique commerciale.|Dans ce cadre, vous interviendrez sur :|Le développement commercial des clients ;|L’identification de nouveaux clients / prospects ;|Le suivi et l’animation des affaires ;|La participation et la préparation des réunions commerciales (prévisions de ventes).|Vous aurez pour principales |missions |de :|Encadrer, motiver et gérer les responsables des différents distributeurs de votre périmètre, afin d’optimiser les indicateurs de performances ;|Établir des devis et des offres commerciales ;|Veiller à l’application des différentes opérations commerciales ;|Fidéliser vos clients par un suivi rigoureux de vos engagements et générer la meilleure satisfaction client ;|Assurer un reporting administratif de vos actions auprès de nos services internes et donner des prévisions fiables de ventes et de suivi des clients.|Qualifications|De formation |Bac / Bac+2 en commerce|, vous disposez d’une première expérience réussie sur une fonction similaire.|Informations complémentaires|Vous êtes organisé(e), structuré(e), méthodique et vous disposez de réelles capacités d’écoute et de communication ;|Vous avez acquis le sens de la Relations Clients, une aisance relationnelle au téléphone et de bonnes aptitudes rédactionnelles ;|Vous êtes également force de proposition pour développer des actions commerciales ;|Vous êtes mobile.|

Title: Customer Solutions Consultant
Description:
About the job Customer Solutions Consultant
|The estimated amount of |money laundered globally| in one year is between |2 to 5% of global GDP|, equivalent to $800 billion - $2 trillion US dollars. This huge amount of illicit funds comes from corruption, drug dealing, child labor, organ trade, and so forth.|
|Using proven top-notch technologies, |Vneuron Risk & Compliance creates world-class software| helping financial institutions reach full AML (Anti-Money Laundering) Compliance and Combat Terrorist Financing (CTF).|
|Our purpose is to| fight financial crimes through technology| in order to ensure global business growth, and international security in order to help change the world for the better.|
|We are trusted by |100+ financial institutions |worldwide from |45+| countries in Europe, Africa, USA, and the Middle East. We have offices in France, Cameroon, Kenya and Qatar. Experts in the field of Compliance, have listed us in Deloitte Regtech Universe and we have been recognized as one of the |Top 100 innovative regtech solutions| for the year 2022. | |About our software suite Reis RCS|
|Our solution |Reis RCS| has been ranked in Chartis Research Quadrant 2022 among the| best |point solutions| in Trade-Based Anti-Money Laundering worldwide.|
|Most recently, we have been awarded the prestigious |Best AML Compliance Solution at the Waters Rankings 2023|, a prestigious Technology magazine based in the UK, USA, and Hong Kong.|
|Our solution |Reis RCS| ensures the automation of AML compliance processes: Real-time transaction filtering, Transaction monitoring using Machine Learning techniques, and KYC. To date, we are applying daily name screening on about |27 million profiles and more than 15,000 users are using our solutions daily.| |Our Culture & Values|
|Vneuron puts the development of its team at the heart of its priorities. We provide a |pleasant and comfortable work environment.| Our organizational structure is |flat| and |collaborative,| and our management is |available |and |present.|
|We invite you to be part of a passionate and committed |young| team who values respect and sharing spirit. You will be surrounded by highly |skilled technical and functional experts| willing to guide you to evolve in all aspects of your career.|
|We believe that every person is unique and special. Thus, we provide |attentive and active listening to your ideas| and propositions as we believe that you will have an essential role in achieving our next milestone and shaping the future of Vneurons value proposition.| |About the job|
|The Customer Solution Consultant supports sales productivity and deal flow by securing the technical win. He collaborates with sales, support, product, and development teams in order to propose the best-suited deals for potential prospects.| |Missions :|
|Qualify potential leads and sales opportunities.|Investigate and analyze prospects' needs.|Elaborate commercial propositions including |technical |and |functional |aspects.|Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to reach the needed information.|Prepare high-quality Proof of Concept (POC) presentations for potential prospects demonstrating how we can satisfy their need and convince them of Vneurons solution.|Ensure negotiations and Q/A sessions|Drive market and competitive intelligence| |Required profile :|
|IT background |Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills|Excellent interpersonal and communication skills|Dynamic, self-starter, curious and empathetic|Good written and verbal English level|Good written and verbal French level|Sharp, clear, and structured communicator| |Nice to have:|
|Engineering degree|Experience in IT sales|Experience in Pre-Sales position|Knowledge in the Risk & Compliance field| |Benefits|
|The opportunity to work in exciting contexts and to help generate a positive impact around the world.|Career Growth opportunity|Healthcare and wellness Benefits to you and your family|An evolving and pleasant environment that challenges you to develop your full potential|Appropriate conditions to help you focus on what you love doing|A winning team that has relied on Respect, Sharing, and Passion for what it does|Equal Employment Opportunities no matter your gender, religion, culture| |Next steps| |If you have the ambition to stimulate your career with new challenges while capitalizing on your potential and your perpetual thirst for learning, this job is for you.|
|Apply Now and become the next Spark!|
|Follow us on LinkedIn to learn more about the Spark team and our Spark solutions.|
|We would be thrilled to meet you and give you much more information!| |
|

Title: Sr. Paid Search Specialist -Spain remote
Description: | Sr. Paid Search Specialist -Spain remote|Date: Apr 10, 2024 Location: Barcelona, B, ES, 08019 |Company: Vista |Who We Are:| |● We are part of the Marketing organization at Vistaprint, belonging to the Integrated Media Team, where we are on the forefront of leveraging data and automation to maximize profit at desirable return on ad spend (ROAS) targets.|● Our team is spread across the globe and is loaded with talent, with team members in Boston, Barcelona, London, Tunis, India and Sydney. |● We function as a centralized team, with our team members embedded in regional teams (NA, ANZ and EU). Your role will be predominantly supporting the EU Market. |● Search and Shopping are a crucial component in Vistaprint’s success, and we’re uniquely positioned to give our customers what they want, when they want it, leveraging our scale to deliver incredible customer experiences. |What You Will Do:|● Be a part of the EU Regional Paid Search team – Manage campaigns across 3 of our European markets and support the rest of the team, while collaborating with colleagues in the EU team, to achieve our business goals. |● Identifying opportunities. You will be helping the team audit areas of opportunity within our accounts and executing against these opportunities to positively impact performance of the channel, in alignment with the company's marketing objectives and you will develop and execute comprehensive paid search strategies across various platforms, including Google Ads and Bing Ads. |● Lead Projects - Oversee and manage projects from inception to completion while ensuring project objectives are met and completed on time and that all deliverables are of the highest quality. |● Optimizing and testing. Apply your understanding of the competitive landscape, our customers’ needs, and current campaign performance to test new ideas for increasing profit and ROAS of our campaigns. |● Reporting on performance. Generate regular reports on your campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for improvement for your markets as well as Projects that you lead for the team. |● Data-driven decisions. You adeptly handle key performance indicators, possess strong problem-solving and analytical skills, and excel in making decisions based on data. |● Delivering an exceptional customer experience through flawless operational execution. Your attention to detail is a strength you will bring to your role. |● Growing the business. You’ll work cross-functionally to unlock insights about customer behavior for other teams, and you’ll continue to leverage this data to grow not just Paid Search but also the business as a whole. |● Stay abreast of industry trends, best practices, and algorithm updates to ensure our campaigns remain competitive and effective.|Your Qualifications:|● 3+ years' experience in managing Search and Shopping campaigns.|● Complete command and mastery of Paid Search, including understanding of automated bidding, mastery of campaign management & account health, performance reporting and storytelling using data. |● Strong and willing team player, who isn’t afraid to help others succeed in addition to achieving their own success. |● Proficiency in Excel. You’re extremely comfortable using Excel.|● Autonomy in problem solving, breaking down larger problems and tasks into smaller increments of work to make progress more quickly. |● Is comfortable multi-tasking. You enjoy and can handle multiple projects at once. You deliver on timelines, set expectations with key stakeholders in your projects, and are comfortable tackling complex business tasks. |● Strong project management skills including ability to deliver requirements, write user-stories, manage stakeholder expectations, calculate and communicate impact Cost-of-Delay, and communicate clearly with stakeholders.|Useful Platform Experience:|● Google Ads, Looker, Products Up, Google Merchant Center, Google Tag Manager, Segment, Google Analytics.|Why You’ll Love Working Here:|We have a working culture where innovation is at the heart of everything that we do. You will be working in a truly global environment with an exceptionally talented and ambitious group in all areas of e-commerce. You will have a lot of fun working with people who are as energetic, smart, and driven as you are. We offer a competitive salary and benefits program. |Vistaprint is a Cimpress company passionate about empowering people to make an impression through individually meaningful, personalized physical products. We are a team of over 10,000 members in 24 countries working together to empower 17 million customers to make an impression. We are passionate, self-starting and audacious. We thrive in an entrepreneurial environment. Whatever geography we’re in, we bring exceptional talent together. We never stop learning and we believe you shouldn't either.|Equal Opportunity Employer (all Locations):|Vistaprint, a Cimpress company, is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, sex, national or ethnic origin, nationality, age, religion, citizenship, disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender presentation, legal or preferred name, marital status, pregnancy, family structure, veteran status or any other basis protected by human rights laws or regulations. This list is not exhaustive and, in fact, in many cases, we strive to do more than the law requires.|Job Segment:| Project Manager, Technology

Title: MERL Officer, MENA
Description: | Position Description|MERL Officer, MENA| Location |Remote in MENA RegionABOUT THE OPPORTUNITY|The Monitoring, Research, and Learning (MERL) Officer plays a key role in the supervision of the Project Manager in driving and improving efforts to measure, capture, and demonstrate the impact of Internews' work at local and global levels. The MERL Officer is responsible for supporting the design and delivery of high-quality research and evaluation of Internews' work in the West Bank and Gaza, including providing technical support to the development and implementation of MERL frameworks, approaches, plans, and systems at the proposal and project start-up phase; devising mechanisms to monitor quality and gather insights; sharing learnings with the implementation team at regular intervals; and taking a hands-on approach to completing impact-related tasks where needed and where gaps arise. |LOGISTICS|This is a remote-based role. Our ideal candidate is based in the UK, Tunisia, or Lebanon. |Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis, so candidates are encouraged to apply soon.|This is is limited-duration position, with an expected end date in September 2026.| |OUR COMMITMENT TO FOSTERING A CULTURE OF BELONGING|We are an organization of dynamic, mission-driven individuals who are passionate about our core values and about supporting positive change in the world. We pride ourselves on our commitment to innovation and flexibility and . Our current team includes a mix of genders, parents and non-parents, and people of multiple races, nationalities, ages, sexual orientations, and socioeconomic backgrounds. We are an EEO employer and encourage candidates of all races, genders, ages, orientations, ethnicities, and national origins to apply, and welcome those with alternative backgrounds and experiences. |DAY-TO-DAY TASKS will include:| Collaborate with the project team on appropriate data collection, collection methods, tools, reporting formats, and M&E frameworks. Support the project team in creating a framework and procedures for the monitoring and evaluation of project activities. Maintain and analyze program and project data in donor and/or Internews' databases, and provide coaching to others as needed. Identify obstacles to implementation and recommend appropriate solutions. Support your project team in writing reports, analyzing findings, and providing recommendations as required for project planning, performance management, and reporting. Conduct field assessments and surveys and undertake field monitoring missions to assess the progress of project implementation using Internews' standard monitoring and evaluation tools and methodologies. Participate in periodic review and planning meetings, generating minutes and lessons learned documents; discussing results of data; and planning action steps to build on strengths and address weaknesses. Develop close working relationships with project partners, participants, and stakeholders when needed. Act as a link between the Regional Manager and the project teams in conducting qualitative and quantitative field monitoring and verification of project implementation. Provide the project team with resources needed to help better plan, monitor, and control the activities. Work closely with the program team to ensure the program's success and highlight deficiencies to the Project Manager and/or Regional Manager when a particular indicator is under or overachieving. As needed, attend meetings with donors, partners, and/or stakeholders when needed. Any other related duties as mutually agreed upon with program team. In all duties, uphold and demonstrate commitment to fostering a culture of . |QUALIFICATIONS WE'RE LOOKING FOR|Required| | A minimum of 5 years of prior relevant experience, including at least 3 years' experience in monitoring and evaluation and research of large, internationally-funded democracy and governance programs. Prior experience with media development programs a significant asset. Relevant university degree in social sciences field, preferably with a focus on research; equivalent lived/professional experience may substitute for a university degree. Proficiency in Arabic and English languages (written and spoken). Previous experience with internationally-funded projects and knowledge of donor requirements. Demonstrated ability to communicate MERL requirements and outcomes to project colleagues and other stakeholders. Proficiency in evaluation design and development of indicators. Good working knowledge of statistics and ability to obtain, analyze, and interpret data and present findings verbally and in writing. Experience in quantitative and qualitative data assessment frameworks such as social network analysis, organizational capacity assessments, and principles of survey design and analysis; familiarity with digital safety/security assessments is an asset. Competent in MS Excel, word processing, PowerPoint. Experience using statistical programs such as SPSS a significant asset. Demonstrated understanding of a range of donor approaches to media development and familiarity with efforts to apply a media lens to development work. Experience in writing reports and storytelling reporting, conducting research and summarizing information. Excellent attention to detail, particularly regarding data collection and input, and in written communication. Experience in other challenging environments and flexibility to apply lessons learned from other contexts. |This position is being offered and hired by Internews Network. Benefits will be consistent with Internews Network's offerings and will be reviewed during the hiring process. Additional information can be found on our page.| |Internews Network is an EEO/AAP/OFCCP employer. Every qualified applicant will be considered for employment. Internews does not discriminate based on race, gender, gender identity or orientation, genetic information, age, national origin, marital status, disability status, political ideology, military or protected veteran status, or any other characteristics protected by applicable law.|

Title: Chargé Projet Lighting
Description:
Description de l'entreprise|Présentation de la société :|
Au service de la compétitivité de tous les grands secteurs industriels : automobile, aéronautique, énergie, ferroviaire, naval, pharmacie et Oil & Gas. Présent dans 30 pays, fort de ses 140 implantations dans le monde, le Groupe privilégie une relation de proximité avec ses clients grâce aux compétences de ses 13 000 collaborateurs. Ingénieriste de premier plan plaçant l’innovation au cœur de sa stratégie, SEGULA Technologies mène des projets d’envergure, allant des études jusqu’à l’industrialisation et la production.|
Présentation contexte projet :|
Dans le cadre d'une activité automobile, plusieurs évolutions d'intégration de fonction de composants Lighting sont à coordonner et à animer afin d'assurer la bonne intégration et le bon développement dans les véhicules avec le constructeur automobile;|
Dans ce cadre nous recherchons  des Chargés Projet Lighting.|Description du poste|Description de la mission :|
Dans le cadre de notre collaborationo avec notre client constructeur automobile, ce dernier souhaite avoir du renfort sur le périmètre Lighting|
Les activités principales à mener sont les suivantes :|
• Poursuivre le développement du projet pour assurer la cohérence du planning projet.|
•Assurer la communication et la remontée vers l’équipe projet et la direction.|
•Gérer la planification et la mise en œuvre des changements pour les phases de construction.|
•Assurer les objectifs de performance du programme QCDP (Qualité, Coût, Délai, Prestation) dans la gestion de projet côté Lightning.|
•Avoir une connaissance sur les Head lamp, Rear lamp et DRL.|
•Avoir une connaissance basique sur les PCB (carte électronique).|
•Connaissance des règles d’électrique et électronique Véhicules.|
•Participation aux réunion projet pour garantir la conformité et la viabilité de la solution en s’assurant au bon déroulement des différentes phases du projet.|
•Vérifier et valider les activités afin d’atteindre les jalons et résoudre les problèmes.|
•Collaboration continue avec les fournisseurs en coordination avec l’usine et les autres départements spécialisés pour assurer le développement du produit et fournir la documentation nécessaire pour chaque Jalon APQP.|
•Assurer la livraison des pièces en bonne maturité qualité et la documentation pour la validation, le banc d’essai et l’homologation.|
•Suivre l’avancement et résultat des tests DV (Design Validation) et PV (Process Validation). Animation des points sensibles avec les différentes parties.|Qualifications|les candidats devront avoir une énergie positive au travail et avoir un gout du travail en équipe prononcé|
Force de proposition et être présents auprès des collègues en cas de besoin.|
• Une expérience de gestion de la relation client/fournisseur ou client/prestataire serait un plus.|
•Une expérience dans l'automobile, si possible sur des systèmes Headlamp,Rear Lamp et DRL|
• Capacité et aptitudes à gérer des projets, être organisé.|
• Bonnes capacités de synthèse, de planification, d'organisation et d'initiative.|
• Vous êtes rigoureux et méthodique (gestion contractuelle), autonome, vous aimez travailler en équipe et vous avez la culture du résultat.|
• Le poste est en environnement international, la pratique du Français (OBLIGATOIRE) et de l'Anglais (OBLIGATOIRE) écrit et parlé est nécessaire.|Informations complémentaires|#TN|

Title: Project Leader
Description:
|Join Yazaki. Connect to the future. | |Country|: [[TUNISIA]] |
|City|: [[BIZERTE]]|
|Worksite / Location|: [[YAPT]] | |Job Function|: [[ Project/Program Management]] |
|Job Discipline|: [[Gen Proj/Prog Mgmt]] |
|Job Family|: [[Project/Program Management ]]| |Founded in 1929, Yazaki is a Japanese full systems supplier of wire harness, electrical, data products and solutions enabling vehicle electrification, connectivity, and autonomy integration. More than 235,000 committed and highly motivated employees in 45 countries make us one of the most successful international automotive suppliers. Join a family-owned company committed to being environmentally friendly in every aspect of its business, contributing to society, and inspiring trust. To strengthen our team, we are looking for a [[PROJECT LEADER ]] in our plant in [[YAPT]]. |
| Monitor new projects according to GPMS (Global Project Management System).| * Ensure the preparation and implementation of "Master Plans" for all new projects and respect milestones.| * Preparation and follow up of the Ramp Up curves of the projects respecting the customers requirements.| * Ensure the management of new projects according to YEL standards and with no red launch tasks and no extra cost.| * Organization and management of prototypes and pre-series.| * Involve the different departments (Engineering, Quality, NYS ...) in the Design review.| - Manage multidisciplinary teams to achieve project objectives.| * Ensure the preparation and share, with the project team, the Lessons Learned during the different project phases.| * Project risk analysis and preparation of recovery plans.|
| Define the production processes and the necessary equipment and launch the PFMEA analysis of the new processes.| * Launch the process and flowchart analysis since the advanced phases of the project.| * Support the release of ECR's and processes to facilitate the JOB1 launch.| * Follow Up of the MPSO process audit (ensure the closing of the actions).| * Deep coordination of "lead plant support".| * Management of customer and Yazaki technical drawings| * Reporting of the different status of the project during adavanced phases.|
| Ensure compliance with the requirements of the Quality Management System (IATF 16949), compliance with YEL / YAP-T procedures, with health and safety rules within the work area (ISO14001 + 45001 ) and the 5S principles.| * Contribute to process improvement, quality and production cost improvement projects within YAPT.| * Contribute to the resolution of internal problems and the analysis of internal/ external complaints.| * Create a 'Learned lessons' approach based on problems faced during the Product / Process development phases.|
|Participate in the preparation and the management of Project budget|
|* Ensure the coordination between the multidisciplinary team of the project.| * Communication with the Program Manager on a regular basis to ensure a clear and continuous flow of information between the plant and the CSC.|
|At Yazaki, we are committed to providing equal employment opportunities for everyone which extends to all aspects of the employment relationship. | |We are looking forward to receiving your application and to get to know you. Please apply by clicking the 'Apply Now' button. We wish you all the success in your application! | |Ps. Didn't found what you are looking for?| Take a look at our careers page! Be careful though, you might find your next dream job.|

|University Degree|

|
|Knowledge for the transport and customs rules|
|

Title: Executive Assistant
Description: |Location: Tunis, TN, 1053 |Our Team:|Vista is a global e-commerce brand empowering more than 16 million micro business owners to professionally promote their business with quality printed and digital marketing products at an affordable price. Our world-class online design studio allows customers to easily customize their products including business cards, marketing materials, signage, promotional products, apparel, Vistaprint websites, digital marketing, cards and stationery at www.vistaprint.com. We support 25 localized Vistaprint websites serving various global markets and have thousands of employees in offices worldwide. |This empowering dynamic position will help to manage the schedules of our five Vice Presidents in Vista Engineering across multiple time zones and requires the ability to anticipate needs, think critically, and offer solutions to problems with a high level of professionalism and confidentiality. |What You Will Do:| Maintain and proactively manage the calendars of five Vice Presidents in Vista Engineering, ensuring scheduling, rescheduling, and confirmation of meetings are handled with foresight and precision. Arrange comprehensive travel itineraries, including international and multi-city trips, with all travel details being meticulously planned and communicated. Conduct detailed and proactive management of expense reports, ensuring accuracy and timely submission. Help to plan and execute multi-day, multi-person offsites and events, both large and small. This involves coordinating virtual and in-person sessions, organizing rooms, managing audiovisual needs, organizing catering, tracking attendance, and distributing materials. Understanding the Vista Engineering Leadership Team's agenda to make informed decisions and recommendations. Analyze calendar patterns and suggest measures to enhance productivity, such as creating or deleting recurring meetings to protect the Vice Presidents. Stay attuned to the organization's pulse, anticipate challenges in stakeholder collaboration, and proactively develop solutions to address these issues. Assist with ad hoc operational projects and organizational updates and provide support for special projects and events as needed. |Your Qualifications:|At Vista, we are striving to hire individuals that add new ideas and perspectives to our teams and enhance our culture. No matter your background or work experience, we strongly encourage you to apply—even if you feel that you don’t meet the exact requirements or have the same qualifications. You might be a great candidate for this or other opportunities. | Minimum 8 years of experience as an Executive Assistant in a dynamic environment, with experience supporting senior executives across multiple time zones. Incredibly organized with outstanding attention to detail, able to multitask and manage parallel matters efficiently. Strong fluency in English language, both spoken and written High proficiency in Google Suite and other organizational tools. Honest, trustworthy, and dependable, with the ability to safeguard sensitive information. Maintains a positive and open-minded approach with excellent service orientation. Anticipates the needs of the executive team and protects their time by prioritizing inquiries and requests while troubleshooting conflicts. Experience coordinating off-sites and team gatherings of varying sizes, locations, and complexities. |Nice to Have:| Experience preparing presentations, agendas, reports, special projects and other documents in support of objectives for the organization. |Why You'll Love Working Here:|There is a lot to love about working at Vista. We are an award winning Remote-First company. We’re an inclusive community. We’re growing (which means you can too). And to help orient us all in the same direction, we have our Vista Behaviors which exemplify the behavioral attributes that make us a culturally strong and high-performing team. |Vista is the design and marketing partner to millions of small businesses around the world. For over 20 years we’ve been inspired by small businesses, and we work incessantly to deliver solutions to their evolving needs. VistaCreate, 99designs by Vista and VistaPrint, all under the parent brand Vista, represent a full-service design, digital and print solution, elevating small businesses’ presence in physical and digital spaces and powering them to achieve success. Vista is focused on making great marketing and design accessible to every small business owner, allowing them to create a cohesive brand image for use in-store, online and on-the-go. |Commitment to Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion:|Vista exists to help our customers live their dreams. Each dream is unique – and the Vista team needs to be as well. We believe in the unique contributions of everyone within a diverse global organization. We are collaborative, inclusive, and innovative. We strive to role model and live an inclusive culture of fairness, respect and belonging for all. And we work together to empower each other, creating a space in which each of us can spark our next great idea. |Equal Opportunity Employer:|Vista, a Cimpress company, is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, sex, national or ethnic origin, nationality, age, religion, citizenship, disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender presentation, legal or preferred name, marital status, pregnancy, family structure, veteran status or any other basis protected by human rights laws or regulations. This list is not exhaustive and, in fact, in many cases, we strive to do more than the law requires. |Job Segment:| Administrative Assistant, Executive Assistant, Secretary, Engineer, Audio Visual, Administrative, Engineering, Creative

Title: Warehouse Raw Material Manager
Description: |The Manager Warehouse will be responsible for ensuring timely, efficient, and accurate flow of material from supplier through kitting of work orders, final packaging, shipment preparation and shipment. The holder of this position will report on the goals and objectives, make recommendations for process improvements, and handle assigned projects as needed.|Main Responsibilities & Tasks:|Manage the business process of receiving goods into the facility and delivering the goods in a timely manner, to the proper destination|Accountable for the inventory accuracy of finished goods and associated accessories. (this includes the accuracy and validation of serial numbers and batch control)|Set and monitor department metrics workcell goals and objectives|Meet assigned goals and objectives|Manage the daily shipping activities to ensure accurate and optimal methods are used in getting product shipped to the customer on time, including selecting the correct and optimal freight carriers for both domestic and international shipments|Manage and participate in continuous improvement processes such as TCC 6S and Kaizen programs to include optimized warehouse layout and environmental storage controls|Manage the process of customer returns and facilitate quarantine needs as they occur, including proper storage and tracking on non-inventory items/requests|Participate in departmental budget needs and manage approved budget responsibly|Manage and report on “aged” inventory, store and process inventory according to FIFO fundamentals and actively track expirations on those inventories that have expirations|Qualification & Skills:|Academic degree in business subject or minimum of 7 years work experience, directly related to the responsibilities|Good working knowledge of outbound logistics and Customs rules and regulations|Good working knowledge of ERP system, best practice warehouse and logistics management, MS Office, and Outlook|Very strong interpersonal skills and ability to motivate direct reports and colleagues in order to successfully accomplish business objectives|Ability to work within a team based environment|Strong managerial and leadership skills to include coaching and employee development|Ability to analyze and report on key data effectively|Ability to assess data and prepare formal recommendations for improvement|Ability to manage an assigned project, using available resources, to completion|Ability to collaborate cross functionally, and obtain expected results|About Sartorius |Sartorius is part of the solution in the fight against cancer, dementia, and many other diseases.
